00031 
00047 void ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym(complex double *f, complex double *flm, 
00048                                   int L, int spin, 
00049                                   ssht_dl_method_t dl_method, 
00050                                   int verbosity) {
00051 
00052   int el, m, mm, ind;
00053   //int t, p;
00054   int eltmp;
00055   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
00056   int el2pel, inds_offset;
00057   int *inds;
00058   double ssign, elfactor;
00059   complex double mmfactor;
00060   double *dl;
00061   double *dl8 = NULL;
00062   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
00063   complex double *exps;
00064   int exps_offset;
00065   double elmmsign, elssign;
00066   int spinneg;
00067   complex double *Fmm, *fext;
00068   int Fmm_offset, Fmm_stride, fext_stride;
00069   fftw_plan plan;
00070 
00071   // Allocate memory.
00072   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
00073   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
00074   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
00075   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
00076   exps = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
00077   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(exps)
00078   inds = (int*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(int));
00079   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
00080 
00081   // Perform precomputations.
00082   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
00083     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
00084   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
00085     signs[m]   =  1.0;
00086     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
00087   }
00088   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
00089   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
00090   exps_offset = L-1;
00091   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
00092     exps[m + exps_offset] = cexp(-I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
00093 
00094   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
00095   if (verbosity > 0) {
00096     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
00097            "Computing inverse transform using MW sampling with ");
00098     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
00099            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
00100     if (verbosity > 1)
00101       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
00102              "Using routine ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym...");
00103   }
00104 
00105   // Compute Fmm.
00106   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00107   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
00108   Fmm_offset = L-1;
00109   Fmm_stride = 2*L-1;    
00110   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
00111   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
00112   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
00113     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
00114     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
00115   }
00116   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
00117   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);   
00118   inds_offset = L-1;
00119   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
00120 
00121     // Compute Wigner plane.
00122     switch (dl_method) {
00123 
00124       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
00125         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
00126           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
00127             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
00128                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00129                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
00130           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
00131                                                        dl8, L,
00132                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00133                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00134                                                        el, 
00135                                                        signs);
00136         }
00137         else {
00138           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
00139                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00140                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
00141           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
00142                                                        dl8, L,
00143                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00144                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00145                                                        el, 
00146                                                        signs);
00147         }
00148         break;
00149   
00150       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
00151         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
00152           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
00153             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
00154                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00155                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
00156           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
00157                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00158                                                            el, signs);
00159         }
00160         else {
00161           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
00162                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00163                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
00164           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
00165                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00166                                                            el, signs);  
00167         }
00168         break;
00169 
00170       default:
00171         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method") 
00172     }
00173 
00174     // Compute Fmm.
00175     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
00176     el2pel = el *el + el;    
00177     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++)
00178       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
00179     for (mm=0; mm<=el; mm++) {
00180       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
00181       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
00182 
00183       for (m=-el; m<=-1; m++) {
00184         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
00185         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset] +=
00186           ssign
00187           * elfactor
00188           * exps[m + exps_offset]         
00189           * elmmsign * dl[mm*dl_stride - m + dl_offset]
00190           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
00191           * flm[ind];
00192       }
00193       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
00194         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
00195         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset] +=
00196           ssign
00197           * elfactor
00198           * exps[m + exps_offset]         
00199           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
00200           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
00201           * flm[ind];
00202       }
00203 
00204     }
00205 
00206   }
00207 
00208   // Free dl memory.
00209   free(dl);
00210   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
00211     free(dl8);
00212 
00213   // Use symmetry to compute Fmm for negative mm.
00214   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
00215     for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++) 
00216       Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset] = 
00217         signs[abs(m)] * ssign 
00218         * Fmm[(-mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
00219 
00220   // Apply phase modulation to account for sampling offset.
00221   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++) {
00222     mmfactor = cexp(I*mm*SSHT_PI/(2.0*L-1.0));
00223     for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
00224       Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset] *=
00225         mmfactor;
00226   }
00227 
00228   // Allocate space for function values.
00229   fext = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00230   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(fext)
00231   fext_stride = 2*L-1;
00232 
00233   // Apply spatial shift.
00234   for (mm=0; mm<=L-1; mm++)
00235     for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
00236       fext[mm*fext_stride + m] = 
00237         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
00238   for (mm=0; mm<=L-1; mm++)
00239     for (m=-(L-1); m<=-1; m++)
00240       fext[mm*fext_stride + (m+2*L-1)] = 
00241         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
00242   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
00243     for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
00244       fext[(mm + 2*L-1)*fext_stride + m] = 
00245         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
00246   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
00247     for (m=-(L-1); m<=-1; m++)
00248       fext[(mm+2*L-1)*fext_stride + m + 2*L-1] = 
00249         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
00250 
00251   // Perform 2D FFT.  
00252   plan = fftw_plan_dft_2d(2*L-1, 2*L-1, Fmm, Fmm, 
00253                           FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00254   fftw_execute_dft(plan, fext, fext);
00255   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
00256 
00257   // Free Fmm memory.
00258   free(Fmm);
00259   
00260   // Extract f from version of f extended to the torus (fext).
00261   memcpy(f, fext, L*(2*L-1)*sizeof(complex double));
00262   /* Memcpy equivalent to:
00263   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++)
00264     for (p=0; p<=2*L-2; p++)
00265       f[t*fext_stride + p] = fext[t*fext_stride + p];
00266   */
00267 
00268   // Free fext memory.
00269   free(fext);
00270 
00271   // Print finished if verbosity set.
00272   if (verbosity > 0) 
00273     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Inverse transform computed!");  
00274 
00275   // Free precomputation memory.
00276   free(sqrt_tbl);
00277   free(signs); 
00278   free(exps);
00279   free(inds);
00280 
00281 }

00299 void ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym_real(double *f, complex double *flm, 
00300                                        int L, 
00301                                        ssht_dl_method_t dl_method, 
00302                                        int verbosity) {
00303 
00304   int el, m, mm, ind;
00305   //int t, p;
00306   int eltmp;
00307   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
00308   int el2pel, inds_offset;
00309   int *inds;
00310   double ssign, elfactor;
00311   complex double mmfactor;
00312   double *dl;
00313   double *dl8 = NULL;
00314   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
00315   complex double *exps;
00316   int exps_offset;
00317   double elmmsign, elssign;
00318   int spinneg;
00319   complex double *Fmm, *Fmm_shift;
00320   double *fext_real;
00321   int Fmm_offset, Fmm_stride, fext_stride;
00322   fftw_plan plan;
00323   int spin = 0;
00324 
00325   // Allocate memory.
00326   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
00327   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
00328   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
00329   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
00330   exps = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
00331   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(exps)
00332   inds = (int*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(int));
00333   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
00334 
00335   // Perform precomputations.
00336   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
00337     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
00338   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
00339     signs[m]   =  1.0;
00340     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
00341   }
00342   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
00343   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
00344   exps_offset = L-1;
00345   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
00346     exps[m + exps_offset] = cexp(-I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
00347 
00348   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
00349   if (verbosity > 0) {
00350     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
00351            "Computing inverse transform using MW sampling with ");
00352     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
00353            L, ",", spin, ", TRUE)");
00354     if (verbosity > 1)
00355       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
00356              "Using routine ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym_real...");
00357   }
00358 
00359   // Compute Fmm.
00360   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*L, sizeof(complex double));
00361   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
00362   Fmm_offset = L-1;
00363   Fmm_stride = L;    
00364   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
00365   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
00366   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
00367     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
00368     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
00369   }
00370   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
00371   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);   
00372   inds_offset = L-1;
00373   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
00374 
00375     // Compute Wigner plane.
00376     switch (dl_method) {
00377 
00378       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
00379         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
00380           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
00381             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
00382                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00383                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
00384           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
00385                                                        dl8, L,
00386                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00387                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00388                                                        el, 
00389                                                        signs);
00390         }
00391         else {
00392           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
00393                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00394                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
00395           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
00396                                                        dl8, L,
00397                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00398                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00399                                                        el, 
00400                                                        signs);
00401         }
00402         break;
00403   
00404       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
00405         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
00406           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
00407             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
00408                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00409                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
00410           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
00411                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00412                                                            el, signs);
00413         }
00414         else {
00415           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
00416                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00417                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
00418           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
00419                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00420                                                            el, signs);  
00421         }
00422         break;
00423 
00424       default:
00425         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method") 
00426     }
00427 
00428 
00429     // Compute Fmm.
00430     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
00431     el2pel = el *el + el;    
00432     for (m=0; m<=el; m++)
00433       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
00434     for (mm=0; mm<=el; mm++) {
00435       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
00436       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
00437 
00438       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
00439         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
00440         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m] +=
00441           ssign
00442           * elfactor
00443           * exps[m + exps_offset]         
00444           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
00445           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
00446           * flm[ind];
00447       }
00448 
00449     }
00450 
00451   }
00452 
00453   // Free dl memory.
00454   free(dl);
00455   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
00456     free(dl8);
00457 
00458   // Use symmetry to compute Fmm for negative mm.
00459   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
00460     for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++) 
00461       Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m] = 
00462         signs[abs(m)] * ssign 
00463         * Fmm[(-mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m];
00464 
00465   // Apply phase modulation to account for sampling offset.
00466   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++) {
00467     mmfactor = cexp(I*mm*SSHT_PI/(2.0*L-1.0));
00468     for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++) 
00469       Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m] *= 
00470         mmfactor;
00471   }
00472 
00473   // Apply spatial shift.
00474   Fmm_shift = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*L, sizeof(complex double));
00475   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm_shift)
00476   for (mm=0; mm<=L-1; mm++)
00477     for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
00478       Fmm_shift[mm*Fmm_stride + m] = 
00479         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m];
00480   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
00481     for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
00482       Fmm_shift[(mm + 2*L-1)*Fmm_stride + m] = 
00483         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m];
00484 
00485   // Allocate space for function values.
00486   fext_real = (double*)calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(double));
00487   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(fext_real)
00488   fext_stride = 2*L-1;
00489 
00490   // Perform 2D FFT.  
00491   plan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_2d(2*L-1, 2*L-1, Fmm_shift, fext_real, 
00492                               FFTW_ESTIMATE);
00493   fftw_execute_dft_c2r(plan, Fmm_shift, fext_real);
00494   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
00495 
00496   // Free Fmm memory.
00497   free(Fmm);
00498   free(Fmm_shift);
00499 
00500   // Extract f from version of f extended to the torus (fext).
00501   memcpy(f, fext_real, L*(2*L-1)*sizeof(double));
00502   /* Memcpy equivalent to:
00503   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++)
00504     for (p=0; p<=2*L-2; p++)
00505       f[t*fext_stride + p] = fext[t*fext_stride + p];
00506   */
00507 
00508   // Free fext memory.
00509   free(fext_real);
00510 
00511   // Print finished if verbosity set.
00512   if (verbosity > 0) 
00513     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Inverse transform computed!");  
00514 
00515   // Free precomputation memory.
00516   free(sqrt_tbl);
00517   free(signs); 
00518   free(exps);
00519   free(inds);
00520 
00521 }

00523 
00539 void ssht_core_mwdirect_inverse(complex double *f, complex double *flm, 
00540                                  int L, int spin, int verbosity) {
00541 
00542   int t, p, m, el, ind, eltmp;
00543   double *dl;
00544   double *sqrt_tbl;  
00545   double theta, phi, elfactor;
00546   int ssign;
00547   int dl_offset, dl_stride, f_stride;
00548 
00549   // Allocate memory.
00550   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
00551   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
00552 
00553     // Perform precomputations.
00554   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
00555     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
00556   ssign = spin & 1;
00557   ssign = 1 - ssign - ssign; // (-1)^spin
00558 
00559   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
00560   if (verbosity > 0) {
00561     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
00562            "Computing inverse transform using MW sampling with ");
00563     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
00564            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
00565     if (verbosity > 1)
00566       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
00567              "Using routine ssht_core_mwdirect_inverse...");
00568   }
00569 
00570   // Initialise f with zeros.
00571   f_stride = 2*L-1;
00572   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++)
00573     for (p=0; p<=2*L-2; p++)
00574       f[t*f_stride + p] = 0.0;
00575 
00576   // Compute inverse transform.
00577   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_FULL);
00578   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
00579   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_FULL);
00580   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_FULL);    
00581   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
00582     theta = ssht_sampling_mw_t2theta(t, L);   
00583     for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) { 
00584       elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
00585       if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
00586         for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
00587           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_full_table(dl, theta, L, 
00588                                         SSHT_DL_FULL,
00589                                         eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
00590       }
00591       else {
00592         ssht_dl_beta_risbo_full_table(dl, theta, L, 
00593                                       SSHT_DL_FULL,
00594                                       el, sqrt_tbl);
00595       }
00596 
00597       for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) {
00598         ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
00599         for (p=0; p<=2*L-2; p++) {
00600           phi = ssht_sampling_mw_p2phi(p, L);
00601           f[t*f_stride + p] += 
00602             ssign 
00603             * elfactor 
00604             * cexp(I*m*phi) 
00605             * dl[(m+dl_offset)*dl_stride - spin + dl_offset]
00606             * flm[ind];
00607         }
00608       }
00609 
00610     }
00611   }
00612 
00613   free(sqrt_tbl);
00614   free(dl);
00615      
00616   // Print finished if verbosity set.
00617   if (verbosity > 0) 
00618     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Inverse transform computed!");  
00619 
00620 }
00621 
00622 
00638 void ssht_core_mwdirect_inverse_sov(complex double *f, complex double *flm, 
00639                                      int L, int spin, int verbosity) {
00640 
00641   int t, p, m, el, ind;
00642   int ftm_stride, ftm_offset, f_stride;
00643   double *dlm1p1_line,  *dl_line;
00644   double *dl_ptr;
00645   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
00646   complex double *ftm, *inout;
00647   double theta, ssign, elfactor;
00648   fftw_plan plan;
00649 
00650   // Allocate memory.
00651   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
00652   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
00653   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
00654   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
00655 
00656   // Perform precomputations.
00657   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
00658     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
00659   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
00660     signs[m]   =  1.0;
00661     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
00662   }
00663   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
00664 
00665   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
00666   if (verbosity > 0) {
00667     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
00668            "Computing inverse transform using MW sampling with ");
00669     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
00670            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
00671     if (verbosity > 1)
00672       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
00673              "Using routine ssht_core_mwdirect_inverse_sov...");
00674   }
00675 
00676   // Compute ftm.
00677   ftm = (complex double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00678   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(ftm)  
00679   ftm_stride = 2*L-1;
00680   ftm_offset = L-1;
00681   dlm1p1_line = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
00682   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dlm1p1_line)
00683   dl_line = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
00684   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl_line)
00685   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
00686     theta = ssht_sampling_mw_t2theta(t, L);   
00687     for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) { 
00688       elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
00689 
00690       // Compute dl line for given spin.
00691       ssht_dl_beta_kostelec_line_table(dlm1p1_line, dl_line,
00692                                        theta, L, -spin, el,
00693                                        sqrt_tbl, signs);
00694       // Switch current and previous dls.
00695       dl_ptr = dl_line;
00696       dl_line = dlm1p1_line;
00697       dlm1p1_line = dl_ptr;
00698     
00699       for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) { 
00700         ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
00701         ftm[t*ftm_stride + m + ftm_offset] +=
00702           ssign 
00703           * elfactor
00704           * dl_line[m + L-1]
00705           * flm[ind];
00706       }
00707     }
00708   }
00709 
00710   // Free dl memory.
00711   free(dlm1p1_line);
00712   free(dl_line);
00713 
00714   // Compute f.   
00715   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
00716   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
00717   f_stride = 2*L-1;
00718   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L-1, inout, inout, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00719   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
00720     for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
00721       inout[m] = ftm[t*ftm_stride + m + ftm_offset];
00722     for (m=-(L-1); m<=-1; m++)
00723       inout[m+2*L-1] = ftm[t*ftm_stride + m + ftm_offset];
00724     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
00725     for (p=0; p<=2*L-2; p++)
00726       f[t*f_stride + p] = inout[p];
00727   }
00728   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
00729 
00730   // Free memory.  
00731   free(ftm);
00732   free(inout);
00733   free(signs);
00734   free(sqrt_tbl);
00735   
00736   // Print finished if verbosity set.
00737   if (verbosity > 0) 
00738     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Inverse transform computed!");  
00739 
00740 }
00741 
00742 
00759 void ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym(complex double *flm, complex double *f, 
00760                                        int L, int spin, 
00761                                        ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
00762                                        int verbosity) {
00763 
00764   int el, m, mm, ind, t, r;
00765   int eltmp;
00766   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
00767   int el2pel, inds_offset;
00768   int *inds;
00769   double ssign, elfactor;
00770   fftw_plan plan, plan_bwd, plan_fwd;
00771   complex double *inout;
00772   complex double *Fmt, *Fmm, *Gmm;
00773   complex double *w, *wr;
00774   complex double *Fmm_pad, *tmp_pad;
00775   int f_stride, Fmt_stride, Fmt_offset, Fmm_stride, Fmm_offset;
00776   double *dl;
00777   double *dl8 = NULL;
00778   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
00779   int w_offset;
00780   complex double *expsm, *expsmm;
00781   int exps_offset;
00782   int elmmsign, elssign;
00783   int spinneg;
00784 
00785   // Allocate memory.
00786   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
00787   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
00788   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
00789   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
00790   expsm = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
00791   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(expsm)
00792   expsmm = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
00793   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(expsmm)
00794   inds = (int*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(int));
00795   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
00796 
00797   // Perform precomputations.
00798   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
00799     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
00800   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
00801     signs[m]   =  1.0;
00802     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
00803   }
00804   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
00805   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
00806   exps_offset = L-1;
00807   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
00808     expsm[m + exps_offset] = cexp(I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
00809   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
00810     expsmm[mm + exps_offset] = cexp(-I*mm*SSHT_PI/(2.0*L-1.0));
00811 
00812   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
00813   if (verbosity > 0) {
00814     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
00815            "Computing forward transform using MW sampling with ");
00816     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
00817            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
00818     if (verbosity > 1)
00819       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
00820              "Using routine ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym...");
00821   }
00822 
00823   // Compute Fourier transform over phi, i.e. compute Fmt.
00824   Fmt = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00825   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmt)
00826   Fmt_stride = 2*L-1;
00827   Fmt_offset = L-1;
00828   f_stride = 2*L-1;
00829   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
00830   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
00831   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L-1, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00832   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
00833     memcpy(inout, &f[t*f_stride], f_stride*sizeof(double complex));
00834     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
00835     for(m=0; m<=L-1; m++) 
00836       Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride + t] = inout[m] / (2.0*L-1.0);
00837     for(m=-(L-1); m<=-1; m++) 
00838       Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride + t] = inout[m+2*L-1] / (2.0*L-1.0);
00839   }
00840 
00841   // Extend Fmt periodically.
00842   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++) 
00843     for (t=L; t<=2*L-2; t++) 
00844       Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride + t] = 
00845         signs[abs(m)] * ssign * Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride + (2*L-2-t)];
00846 
00847   // Compute Fourier transform over theta, i.e. compute Fmm.
00848   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00849   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
00850   Fmm_stride = 2*L-1;
00851   Fmm_offset = L-1;
00852   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++) {
00853     memcpy(inout, &Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride], Fmt_stride*sizeof(complex double));
00854     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
00855     for(mm=0; mm<=L-1; mm++) 
00856       Fmm[(m+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] = 
00857         inout[mm] / (2.0*L-1.0);
00858     for(mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
00859       Fmm[(m+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] = 
00860         inout[mm+2*L-1] / (2.0*L-1.0);
00861   }
00862   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
00863   free(inout);
00864 
00865   // Apply phase modulation to account for sampling offset.
00866   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
00867     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
00868       Fmm[(m+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] *=
00869         expsmm[mm + exps_offset];
00870 
00871   // Compute weights.
00872   w = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
00873   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(w)
00874   w_offset = 2*(L-1);
00875   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
00876     w[mm+w_offset] = ssht_sampling_weight_mw(mm);
00877 
00878   // Compute IFFT of w to give wr.
00879   wr = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
00880   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(wr)
00881   inout = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
00882   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
00883   plan_bwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00884   plan_fwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
00885   for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++) 
00886     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
00887   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++) 
00888     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
00889   fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
00890   for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++) 
00891     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
00892   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
00893     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
00894 
00895   // Compute Gmm by convolution implemented as product in real space.
00896   Fmm_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
00897   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm_pad)
00898   tmp_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
00899   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(tmp_pad)
00900   Gmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
00901   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Gmm)
00902   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++) {
00903 
00904     // Zero-pad Fmm.
00905     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-L; mm++)
00906       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
00907     for (mm=L; mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
00908       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
00909     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
00910       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = 
00911         Fmm[(m+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset];
00912 
00913     // Compute IFFT of Fmm.
00914     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
00915       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
00916     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
00917       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
00918     fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
00919     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
00920       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
00921     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
00922       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
00923 
00924     // Compute product of Fmm and weight in real space.
00925     for (r=-2*(L-1); r<=2*(L-1); r++) 
00926       Fmm_pad[r + w_offset] *= wr[-r + w_offset];
00927 
00928     // Compute Gmm by FFT.
00929     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
00930       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
00931     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
00932       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
00933     fftw_execute_dft(plan_fwd, inout, inout);
00934     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
00935       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
00936     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
00937       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
00938 
00939     // Extract section of Gmm of interest.
00940     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
00941       Gmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset] = 
00942         Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] * 2.0 * SSHT_PI / (4.0*L-3.0);
00943 
00944   }
00945   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_bwd);
00946   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_fwd);
00947 
00948   // Compute flm.
00949   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
00950   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
00951   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
00952     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
00953     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
00954   }
00955   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
00956   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);   
00957   inds_offset = L-1;
00958   for (el=0; el<=L-1; el++) {
00959     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) {
00960       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
00961       flm[ind] = 0.0;
00962     }
00963   }
00964   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
00965 
00966     // Compute Wigner plane.
00967     switch (dl_method) {
00968 
00969       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
00970         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
00971           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
00972             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
00973                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00974                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
00975           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
00976                                                        dl8, L,
00977                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00978                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00979                                                        el, 
00980                                                        signs);
00981         }
00982         else {
00983           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
00984                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00985                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
00986           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
00987                                                        dl8, L,
00988                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
00989                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
00990                                                        el, 
00991                                                        signs);
00992         }
00993         break;
00994   
00995       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
00996         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
00997           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
00998             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
00999                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01000                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
01001           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
01002                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01003                                                            el, signs);
01004         }
01005         else {
01006           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
01007                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01008                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
01009           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
01010                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01011                                                            el, signs);  
01012         }
01013         break;
01014 
01015       default:
01016         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method") 
01017     }
01018 
01019     // Compute flm.
01020     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
01021     el2pel = el *el + el;    
01022     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++)
01023       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
01024     elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : signs[el];
01025 
01026     for (m=-el; m<=-1; m++) {
01027       // mm = 0
01028       ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
01029       flm[ind] +=
01030         ssign 
01031         * elfactor
01032         * expsm[m + exps_offset]
01033         * signs[el] * dl[0*dl_stride - m + dl_offset]
01034         * elssign * dl[0*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
01035         * Gmm[(0+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
01036     }
01037     for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
01038       // mm = 0
01039       ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
01040       flm[ind] +=
01041         ssign 
01042         * elfactor
01043         * expsm[m + exps_offset]
01044         * dl[0*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
01045         * elssign * dl[0*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
01046         * Gmm[(0+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
01047     }
01048 
01049     for (mm=1; mm<=el; mm++) {
01050       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
01051       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
01052 
01053       for (m=-el; m<=-1; m++) {
01054         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
01055         flm[ind] +=
01056           ssign
01057           * elfactor
01058           * expsm[m + exps_offset]
01059           * elmmsign * dl[mm*dl_stride - m + dl_offset]
01060           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
01061           * ( Gmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset]
01062               + signs[-m] * ssign
01063               * Gmm[(-mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset]);
01064       }
01065       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
01066         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
01067         flm[ind] +=
01068           ssign 
01069           * elfactor
01070           * expsm[m + exps_offset]
01071           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
01072           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
01073           * ( Gmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset]
01074               + signs[m] * ssign
01075               * Gmm[(-mm+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset]);
01076       }
01077 
01078     }  
01079 
01080   }
01081 
01082   // Free memory.
01083   free(dl);
01084   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
01085     free(dl8);
01086   free(Fmt);
01087   free(Fmm);
01088   free(inout);
01089   free(w);
01090   free(wr);
01091   free(Fmm_pad);
01092   free(tmp_pad);
01093   free(Gmm);
01094   free(sqrt_tbl);
01095   free(signs); 
01096   free(expsm);
01097   free(expsmm);
01098   free(inds);
01099 
01100   // Print finished if verbosity set.
01101   if (verbosity > 0) 
01102     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Forward transform computed!");  
01103 
01104 }
01105 
01106 
01123 void ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_real(complex double *flm, double *f, 
01124                                             int L,
01125                                             ssht_dl_method_t dl_method, 
01126                                             int verbosity) {
01127 
01128   int el, m, mm, ind, ind_nm, t, r;
01129   int eltmp;
01130   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
01131   int el2pel, inds_offset;
01132   int *inds;
01133   double ssign, elfactor;
01134   fftw_plan plan, plan_bwd, plan_fwd;
01135   double *in_real;
01136   complex double *inout, *out;
01137   complex double *Fmt, *Fmm, *Gmm;
01138   complex double *w, *wr;
01139   complex double *Fmm_pad, *tmp_pad;
01140   int f_stride, Fmt_stride, Fmt_offset, Fmm_stride, Fmm_offset, Gmm_stride;
01141   double *dl;
01142   double *dl8 = NULL;
01143   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
01144   int w_offset;
01145   complex double *expsm, *expsmm;
01146   int exps_offset;
01147   int elmmsign, elssign;
01148   int spinneg;
01149   int spin = 0;
01150 
01151   // Allocate memory.
01152   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
01153   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
01154   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
01155   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
01156   expsm = (complex double*)calloc(L, sizeof(complex double));
01157   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(expsm)
01158   expsmm = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
01159   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(expsmm)
01160   inds = (int*)calloc(L, sizeof(int));
01161   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
01162 
01163   // Perform precomputations.
01164   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
01165     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
01166   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
01167     signs[m]   =  1.0;
01168     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
01169   }
01170   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
01171   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
01172   exps_offset = L-1;
01173   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
01174     expsm[m] = cexp(I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
01175   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
01176     expsmm[mm + exps_offset] = cexp(-I*mm*SSHT_PI/(2.0*L-1.0));
01177 
01178   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
01179   if (verbosity > 0) {
01180     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
01181            "Computing forward transform using MW sampling with ");
01182     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
01183            L, ",", spin, ", TRUE)");
01184     if (verbosity > 1)
01185       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
01186              "Using routine ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_real...");
01187   }
01188 
01189   // Compute Fourier transform over phi, i.e. compute Fmt.
01190   Fmt = (complex double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
01191   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmt)
01192   Fmt_stride = 2*L-1;
01193   Fmt_offset = L-1;
01194   f_stride = 2*L-1;
01195   in_real = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
01196   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(in_real)
01197   out = (complex double*)calloc(L, sizeof(complex double));
01198   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(out)
01199   plan = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_1d(2*L-1, in_real, out, FFTW_MEASURE);
01200   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
01201     memcpy(in_real, &f[t*f_stride], f_stride*sizeof(double));
01202     fftw_execute_dft_r2c(plan, in_real, out);
01203     for(m=0; m<=L-1; m++) 
01204       Fmt[m*Fmt_stride + t] = out[m] / (2.0*L-1.0);
01205   }
01206   free(in_real);
01207   free(out);
01208   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
01209 
01210   // Extend Fmt periodically.
01211   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++) 
01212     for (t=L; t<=2*L-2; t++) 
01213       Fmt[m*Fmt_stride + t] = 
01214         signs[abs(m)] * ssign * Fmt[m*Fmt_stride + (2*L-2-t)];
01215 
01216   // Compute Fourier transform over theta, i.e. compute Fmm.
01217   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
01218   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
01219   Fmm_stride = 2*L-1;
01220   Fmm_offset = L-1;
01221   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
01222   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
01223   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L-1, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
01224   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++) {
01225     memcpy(inout, &Fmt[m*Fmt_stride], Fmt_stride*sizeof(complex double));
01226     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
01227     for(mm=0; mm<=L-1; mm++) 
01228       Fmm[m*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] = 
01229         inout[mm] / (2.0*L-1.0);
01230     for(mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
01231       Fmm[m*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] = 
01232         inout[mm+2*L-1] / (2.0*L-1.0);
01233   }
01234   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
01235   free(inout);
01236 
01237   // Apply phase modulation to account for sampling offset.
01238   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
01239     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
01240       Fmm[m*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] *= 
01241         expsmm[mm + exps_offset];
01242 
01243   // Compute weights.
01244   w = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
01245   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(w)
01246   w_offset = 2*(L-1);
01247   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
01248     w[mm+w_offset] = ssht_sampling_weight_mw(mm);
01249 
01250   // Compute IFFT of w to give wr.
01251   wr = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
01252   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(wr)
01253   inout = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
01254   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
01255   plan_bwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
01256   plan_fwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
01257   for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++) 
01258     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
01259   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++) 
01260     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
01261   fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
01262   for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++) 
01263     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
01264   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
01265     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
01266 
01267   // Compute Gmm by convolution implemented as product in real space.
01268   Fmm_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
01269   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm_pad)
01270   tmp_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
01271   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(tmp_pad)
01272   Gmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*L, sizeof(complex double));
01273   Gmm_stride = L;
01274   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Gmm)
01275   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++) {
01276 
01277     // Zero-pad Fmm.
01278     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-L; mm++)
01279       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
01280     for (mm=L; mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
01281       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
01282     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
01283       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = 
01284         Fmm[m*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset];
01285 
01286     // Compute IFFT of Fmm.
01287     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
01288       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
01289     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
01290       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
01291     fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
01292     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
01293       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
01294     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
01295       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
01296 
01297     // Compute product of Fmm and weight in real space.
01298     for (r=-2*(L-1); r<=2*(L-1); r++) 
01299       Fmm_pad[r + w_offset] *= wr[-r + w_offset];
01300 
01301     // Compute Gmm by FFT.
01302     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
01303       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
01304     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
01305       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
01306     fftw_execute_dft(plan_fwd, inout, inout);
01307     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
01308       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
01309     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
01310       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
01311 
01312     // Extract section of Gmm of interest.
01313     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
01314       Gmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + m] = 
01315         Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] * 2.0 * SSHT_PI / (4.0*L-3.0);
01316 
01317   }
01318   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_bwd);
01319   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_fwd);
01320 
01321   // Compute flm.
01322   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
01323   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
01324   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
01325     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
01326     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
01327   }
01328   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
01329   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER); 
01330   inds_offset = 0;
01331   for (el=0; el<=L-1; el++) {
01332     for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
01333       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
01334       flm[ind] = 0.0;
01335     }
01336   }
01337   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
01338 
01339     // Compute Wigner plane.
01340     switch (dl_method) {
01341 
01342       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
01343         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
01344           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
01345             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
01346                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01347                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
01348           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
01349                                                        dl8, L,
01350                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01351                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01352                                                        el, 
01353                                                        signs);
01354         }
01355         else {
01356           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
01357                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01358                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
01359           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
01360                                                        dl8, L,
01361                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01362                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01363                                                        el, 
01364                                                        signs);
01365         }
01366         break;
01367   
01368       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
01369         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
01370           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
01371             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
01372                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01373                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
01374           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
01375                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01376                                                            el, signs);
01377         }
01378         else {
01379           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
01380                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01381                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
01382           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
01383                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01384                                                            el, signs);  
01385         }
01386         break;
01387 
01388       default:
01389         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method") 
01390     }
01391 
01392 
01393     // Compute flm.
01394     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
01395     el2pel = el *el + el;    
01396     for (m=0; m<=el; m++)
01397       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
01398     elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : signs[el];
01399 
01400     for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
01401       // mm = 0
01402       ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
01403       flm[ind] +=
01404         ssign 
01405         * elfactor
01406         * expsm[m]
01407         * dl[0*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
01408         * elssign * dl[0*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
01409         * Gmm[(0+Fmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + m];
01410     }
01411 
01412     for (mm=1; mm<=el; mm++) {
01413       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
01414       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
01415 
01416       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
01417         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
01418         flm[ind] +=
01419           ssign 
01420           * elfactor
01421           * expsm[m]
01422           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
01423           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
01424           * ( Gmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + m]
01425               + signs[m] * ssign
01426               * Gmm[(-mm+Fmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + m]);
01427       }
01428 
01429     }  
01430 
01431   }
01432 
01433   // Set flm values for negative m using conjugate symmetry.
01434   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
01435     for (m=1; m<=el; m++) {
01436       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
01437       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind_nm, el, -m);
01438       flm[ind_nm] = signs[m] * conj(flm[ind]);
01439     }
01440   }
01441 
01442   // Free memory.
01443   free(dl);
01444   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
01445     free(dl8);
01446   free(Fmt);
01447   free(Fmm);
01448   free(inout);
01449   free(w);
01450   free(wr);
01451   free(Fmm_pad);
01452   free(tmp_pad);
01453   free(Gmm);
01454   free(sqrt_tbl);
01455   free(signs); 
01456   free(expsm);
01457   free(expsmm);
01458   free(inds);
01459 
01460   // Print finished if verbosity set.
01461   if (verbosity > 0) 
01462     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Forward transform computed!");  
01463 
01464 }
01465 
01466 
01467 //============================================================================
01468 // MW South pole interfaces
01469 //============================================================================
01470 
01471 
01492 void ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym_pole(complex double *f, 
01493                                        complex double *f_sp, double *phi_sp,
01494                                        complex double *flm, 
01495                                        int L, int spin, 
01496                                        ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
01497                                        int verbosity) {
01498 
01499   complex double* f_full;
01500   int f_stride = 2*L-1;
01501 
01502   // Allocate full array.
01503   f_full = (complex double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
01504   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
01505 
01506   // Perform inverse transform.
01507   ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym(f_full, flm, L, spin, 
01508                                dl_method, verbosity);     
01509 
01510   // Copy output function values, including separate point for South pole.
01511   memcpy(f, f_full, (L-1)*(2*L-1)*sizeof(complex double));
01512   *f_sp = f_full[(L-1)*f_stride + 0];
01513   *phi_sp = ssht_sampling_mw_p2phi(0, L);
01514         
01515   // Free memory.
01516   free(f_full);
01517 
01518 }
01519 
01520 
01538 void ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym_real_pole(double *f, 
01539                                             double *f_sp,
01540                                             complex double *flm, 
01541                                             int L, 
01542                                             ssht_dl_method_t dl_method, 
01543                                             int verbosity) {
01544 
01545   double *f_full;
01546   int f_stride = 2*L-1;
01547 
01548   // Allocate full array.
01549   f_full = (double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(double));
01550   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
01551 
01552   // Perform inverse transform.
01553   ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym_real(f_full, flm, L, 
01554                                     dl_method, verbosity);
01555 
01556   // Copy output function values, including separate point for South pole.
01557   memcpy(f, f_full, (L-1)*(2*L-1)*sizeof(double));
01558   *f_sp = f_full[(L-1)*f_stride + 0];
01559 
01560   // Free memory.
01561   free(f_full);
01562 
01563 }
01564 
01565 
01586 void ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_pole(complex double *flm, complex double *f,
01587                                             complex double f_sp, double phi_sp,
01588                                             int L, int spin, 
01589                                             ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
01590                                             int verbosity) {
01591 
01592   complex double *f_full;
01593   int p, f_stride = 2*L-1;
01594   double phi;
01595 
01596   // Copy function values to full array.
01597   f_full = (complex double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
01598   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
01599   memcpy(f_full, f, (L-1)*(2*L-1)*sizeof(complex double));
01600 
01601   // Define South pole for all phi.
01602   for (p=0; p<=2*L-2; p++) {
01603     phi = ssht_sampling_mw_p2phi(p, L);
01604     f_full[(L-1)*f_stride + p] = f_sp * cexp(I*spin*(phi-phi_sp)); 
01605   }
01606 
01607   // Perform forward transform.
01608   ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym(flm, f_full, L, spin, 
01609                                     dl_method, verbosity);
01610 
01611   // Free memory.
01612   free(f_full);
01613 
01614 }
01615 
01616 
01634 void ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_real_pole(complex double *flm, 
01635                                                  double *f, 
01636                                                  double f_sp,
01637                                                  int L, 
01638                                                  ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
01639                                                  int verbosity) {
01640 
01641   double *f_full;
01642   int p, f_stride = 2*L-1;
01643 
01644   // Copy function values to full array.
01645   f_full = (double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(double));
01646   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
01647   memcpy(f_full, f, (L-1)*(2*L-1)*sizeof(double));
01648 
01649   // Define South pole for all phi.
01650   for (p=0; p<=2*L-2; p++)
01651     f_full[(L-1)*f_stride + p] = f_sp; 
01652 
01653   // Perform forward transform.
01654   ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_real(flm, f_full, L, 
01655                                          dl_method, verbosity);
01656 
01657   // Free memory.
01658   free(f_full);
01659 
01660 }
01661 
01662 
01663 //============================================================================
01664 // MW SS algorithms
01665 //============================================================================
01666 
01667 
01683 void ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss(complex double *f, complex double *flm, 
01684                                      int L, int spin, 
01685                                      ssht_dl_method_t dl_method, 
01686                                      int verbosity) {
01687 
01688   int el, m, mm, ind;
01689   //int t, p;
01690   int eltmp;
01691   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
01692   int el2pel, inds_offset;
01693   int *inds;
01694   double ssign, elfactor;
01695   double *dl;
01696   double *dl8 = NULL;
01697   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
01698   complex double *exps;
01699   int exps_offset;
01700   double elmmsign, elssign;
01701   int spinneg;
01702   complex double *Fmm, *fext;
01703   int Fmm_offset, Fmm_stride, fext_stride;
01704   fftw_plan plan;
01705 
01706   // Allocate memory.
01707   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
01708   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
01709   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
01710   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
01711   exps = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
01712   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(exps)
01713   inds = (int*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(int));
01714   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
01715 
01716   // Perform precomputations.
01717   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
01718     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
01719   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
01720     signs[m]   =  1.0;
01721     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
01722   }
01723   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
01724   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
01725   exps_offset = L-1;
01726   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
01727     exps[m + exps_offset] = cexp(-I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
01728 
01729   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
01730   if (verbosity > 0) {
01731     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
01732            "Computing inverse transform using MW symmetric sampling with ");
01733     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
01734            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
01735     if (verbosity > 1)
01736       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
01737              "Using routine ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss...");
01738   }
01739 
01740   // Compute Fmm.
01741   // Note that m and mm indices are increased in size by one and
01742   // will be filled with zeros by calloc.
01743   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
01744   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
01745   Fmm_offset = L-1;
01746   Fmm_stride = 2*L;    
01747   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
01748   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
01749   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
01750     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
01751     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
01752   }
01753   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
01754   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);   
01755   inds_offset = L-1;
01756   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
01757 
01758     // Compute Wigner plane.
01759     switch (dl_method) {
01760 
01761       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
01762         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
01763           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
01764             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
01765                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01766                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
01767           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
01768                                                        dl8, L,
01769                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01770                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01771                                                        el, 
01772                                                        signs);
01773         }
01774         else {
01775           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
01776                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01777                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
01778           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
01779                                                        dl8, L,
01780                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01781                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
01782                                                        el, 
01783                                                        signs);
01784         }
01785         break;
01786   
01787       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
01788         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
01789           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
01790             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
01791                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01792                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
01793           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
01794                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01795                                                            el, signs);
01796         }
01797         else {
01798           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
01799                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01800                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
01801           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
01802                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
01803                                                            el, signs);  
01804         }
01805         break;
01806 
01807       default:
01808         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method") 
01809     }
01810 
01811     // Compute Fmm.
01812     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
01813     el2pel = el *el + el;    
01814     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++)
01815       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
01816     for (mm=0; mm<=el; mm++) {
01817       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
01818       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
01819 
01820       for (m=-el; m<=-1; m++) {
01821         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
01822         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset] +=
01823           ssign
01824           * elfactor
01825           * exps[m + exps_offset]         
01826           * elmmsign * dl[mm*dl_stride - m + dl_offset]
01827           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
01828           * flm[ind];
01829       }
01830       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
01831         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
01832         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset] +=
01833           ssign
01834           * elfactor
01835           * exps[m + exps_offset]         
01836           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
01837           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
01838           * flm[ind];
01839       }
01840 
01841     }
01842 
01843   }
01844 
01845   // Free dl memory.
01846   free(dl);
01847   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
01848     free(dl8);
01849 
01850   // Use symmetry to compute Fmm for negative mm.
01851   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
01852     for (m=-(L-1); m<=L; m++) 
01853       Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset] = 
01854         signs[abs(m)] * ssign 
01855         * Fmm[(-mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
01856 
01857   // Allocate space for function values.
01858   // Note that t and p indices of fext are increased in size by
01859   // one compared to usual sampling.
01860   fext = (complex double*)calloc((2*L)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
01861   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(fext)
01862   fext_stride = 2*L;
01863 
01864   // Apply spatial shift.  
01865   for (mm=0; mm<=L; mm++)
01866     for (m=0; m<=L; m++)
01867       fext[mm*fext_stride + m] =
01868         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
01869   for (mm=0; mm<=L; mm++)
01870     for (m=-(L-1); m<=-1; m++)
01871       fext[mm*fext_stride + (m+2*L-1+1)] =
01872         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
01873   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
01874     for (m=0; m<=L; m++)
01875       fext[(mm + 2*L-1+1)*fext_stride + m] =
01876         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
01877   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
01878     for (m=-(L-1); m<=-1; m++)
01879       fext[(mm+2*L-1+1)*fext_stride + m + 2*L-1+1] =
01880         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m + Fmm_offset];
01881 
01882   // Perform 2D FFT.    
01883   plan = fftw_plan_dft_2d(2*L, 2*L, Fmm, Fmm, 
01884                           FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_ESTIMATE);
01885   fftw_execute_dft(plan, fext, fext);
01886   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
01887 
01888   // Free Fmm memory.
01889   free(Fmm);
01890   
01891   // Extract f from version of f extended to the torus (fext).
01892   // Note that t and p indices of fext are increased in size by
01893   // one compared to usual sampling.
01894   memcpy(f, fext, (L+1)*(2*L)*sizeof(complex double));
01895 
01896   // Free fext memory.
01897   free(fext);
01898 
01899   // Print finished if verbosity set.
01900   if (verbosity > 0) 
01901     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Inverse transform computed!");  
01902 
01903   // Free precomputation memory.
01904   free(sqrt_tbl);
01905   free(signs); 
01906   free(exps);
01907   free(inds);
01908 
01909 }
01910 
01911 
01928 void ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss_real(double *f, complex double *flm, 
01929                                           int L, 
01930                                           ssht_dl_method_t dl_method, 
01931                                           int verbosity) {
01932 
01933   int el, m, mm, ind;
01934   //int t, p;
01935   int eltmp;
01936   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
01937   int el2pel, inds_offset;
01938   int *inds;
01939   double ssign, elfactor;
01940   double *dl;
01941   double *dl8 = NULL;
01942   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
01943   complex double *exps;
01944   int exps_offset;
01945   double elmmsign, elssign;
01946   int spinneg;
01947   complex double *Fmm, *Fmm_shift;
01948   double *fext_real;
01949   int Fmm_offset, Fmm_stride, fext_stride;
01950   fftw_plan plan;
01951   int spin = 0;
01952 
01953   // Allocate memory.
01954   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
01955   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
01956   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
01957   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
01958   exps = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
01959   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(exps)
01960   inds = (int*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(int));
01961   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
01962 
01963   // Perform precomputations.
01964   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
01965     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
01966   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
01967     signs[m]   =  1.0;
01968     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
01969   }
01970   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
01971   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
01972   exps_offset = L-1;
01973   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
01974     exps[m + exps_offset] = cexp(-I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
01975 
01976   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
01977   if (verbosity > 0) {
01978     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
01979            "Computing inverse transform using MW symmetric sampling with ");
01980     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
01981            L, ",", spin, ", TRUE)");
01982     if (verbosity > 1)
01983       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
01984              "Using routine ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss_real...");
01985   }
01986 
01987   // Compute Fmm.
01988   // Note that m and mm indices are increased in size by one and
01989   // will be filled with zeros by calloc.
01990   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L)*(L+1), sizeof(complex double));
01991   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
01992   Fmm_offset = L-1;
01993   Fmm_stride = L+1;    
01994   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
01995   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
01996   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
01997     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
01998     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
01999   }
02000   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
02001   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);   
02002   inds_offset = L-1;
02003   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
02004 
02005     // Compute Wigner plane.
02006     switch (dl_method) {
02007 
02008       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
02009         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
02010           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
02011             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
02012                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02013                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
02014           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
02015                                                        dl8, L,
02016                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02017                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02018                                                        el, 
02019                                                        signs);
02020         }
02021         else {
02022           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
02023                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02024                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
02025           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
02026                                                        dl8, L,
02027                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02028                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02029                                                        el, 
02030                                                        signs);
02031         }
02032         break;
02033   
02034       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
02035         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
02036           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
02037             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
02038                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02039                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
02040           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
02041                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02042                                                            el, signs);
02043         }
02044         else {
02045           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
02046                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02047                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
02048           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
02049                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02050                                                            el, signs);  
02051         }
02052         break;
02053 
02054       default:
02055         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method") 
02056     }
02057 
02058     // Compute Fmm.
02059     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
02060     el2pel = el *el + el;    
02061     for (m=0; m<=el; m++)
02062       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
02063     for (mm=0; mm<=el; mm++) {
02064       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
02065       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
02066 
02067       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
02068         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
02069         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m] +=
02070           ssign
02071           * elfactor
02072           * exps[m + exps_offset]         
02073           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
02074           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
02075           * flm[ind];
02076       }
02077 
02078     }
02079 
02080   }
02081 
02082   // Free dl memory.
02083   free(dl);
02084   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
02085     free(dl8);
02086 
02087   // Use symmetry to compute Fmm for negative mm.
02088   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
02089     for (m=0; m<=L; m++) 
02090       Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m] = 
02091         signs[abs(m)] * ssign 
02092         * Fmm[(-mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m];
02093 
02094   // Apply spatial shift.
02095   Fmm_shift = (complex double*)calloc((2*L)*(L+1), sizeof(complex double));
02096   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm_shift)
02097   for (mm=0; mm<=L-1; mm++)
02098     for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
02099       Fmm_shift[mm*Fmm_stride + m] = 
02100         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m];
02101   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
02102     for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
02103       Fmm_shift[(mm + 2*L-1+1)*Fmm_stride + m] = 
02104         Fmm[(mm + Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + m];
02105 
02106   // Allocate space for function values.
02107   // Note that t and p indices of fext are increased in size by
02108   // one compared to usual sampling.
02109   fext_real = (double*)calloc((2*L)*(2*L), sizeof(double));
02110   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(fext_real)
02111   fext_stride = 2*L;
02112 
02113   // Perform 2D FFT.  
02114   plan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_2d(2*L, 2*L, Fmm_shift, fext_real, 
02115                               FFTW_ESTIMATE);
02116   fftw_execute_dft_c2r(plan, Fmm_shift, fext_real);
02117   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
02118 
02119   // Free Fmm memory.
02120   free(Fmm);
02121   free(Fmm_shift);
02122 
02123   // Extract f from version of f extended to the torus (fext).
02124   // Note that t and p indices of fext are increased in size by
02125   // one compared to usual sampling.
02126   memcpy(f, fext_real, (L+1)*(2*L)*sizeof(double));
02127 
02128   // Free fext memory.
02129   free(fext_real);
02130 
02131   // Print finished if verbosity set.
02132   if (verbosity > 0) 
02133     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Inverse transform computed!");  
02134 
02135   // Free precomputation memory.
02136   free(sqrt_tbl);
02137   free(signs); 
02138   free(exps);
02139   free(inds);
02140 
02141 }
02142 
02143 
02160 void ssht_core_mwdirect_inverse_ss(complex double *f, complex double *flm, 
02161                                    int L, int spin, int verbosity) {
02162 
02163   int t, p, m, el, ind, eltmp;
02164   double *dl;
02165   double *sqrt_tbl;  
02166   double theta, phi, elfactor;
02167   int ssign;
02168   int dl_offset, dl_stride, f_stride;
02169 
02170   // Allocate memory.
02171   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
02172   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
02173 
02174     // Perform precomputations.
02175   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
02176     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
02177   ssign = spin & 1;
02178   ssign = 1 - ssign - ssign; // (-1)^spin
02179 
02180   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
02181   if (verbosity > 0) {
02182     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
02183            "Computing inverse transform using MW sampling with ");
02184     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
02185            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
02186     if (verbosity > 1)
02187       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
02188              "Using routine ssht_core_mwdirect_inverse_ss...");
02189   }
02190 
02191   // Initialise f with zeros.
02192   f_stride = 2*L;
02193   for (t=0; t<=L; t++)
02194     for (p=0; p<=2*L-1; p++)
02195       f[t*f_stride + p] = 0.0;
02196 
02197   // Compute inverse transform.
02198   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_FULL);
02199   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
02200   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_FULL);
02201   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_FULL);    
02202   for (t=0; t<=L; t++) {
02203     theta = ssht_sampling_mw_ss_t2theta(t, L);   
02204     for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) { 
02205       elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
02206       if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
02207         for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
02208           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_full_table(dl, theta, L, 
02209                                         SSHT_DL_FULL,
02210                                         eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
02211       }
02212       else {
02213         ssht_dl_beta_risbo_full_table(dl, theta, L, 
02214                                       SSHT_DL_FULL,
02215                                       el, sqrt_tbl);
02216       }
02217 
02218       for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) {
02219         ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
02220         for (p=0; p<=2*L-1; p++) {
02221           phi = ssht_sampling_mw_ss_p2phi(p, L);
02222           f[t*f_stride + p] += 
02223             ssign 
02224             * elfactor 
02225             * cexp(I*m*phi) 
02226             * dl[(m+dl_offset)*dl_stride - spin + dl_offset]
02227             * flm[ind];
02228         }
02229       }
02230 
02231     }
02232   }
02233 
02234   free(sqrt_tbl);
02235   free(dl);
02236      
02237   // Print finished if verbosity set.
02238   if (verbosity > 0) 
02239     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Inverse transform computed!");  
02240 
02241 }
02242 
02243 
02260 void ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_ss(complex double *flm, complex double *f, 
02261                                           int L, int spin, 
02262                                           ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
02263                                           int verbosity) {
02264 
02265   int el, m, mm, ind, t, r;
02266   int eltmp;
02267   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
02268   int el2pel, inds_offset;
02269   int *inds;
02270   double ssign, elfactor;
02271   fftw_plan plan, plan_bwd, plan_fwd;
02272   complex double *inout;
02273   complex double *Fmt, *Fmm, *Gmm;
02274   complex double *w, *wr;
