02275   complex double *Fmm_pad, *tmp_pad;
02276   int f_stride, Fmt_stride, Fmt_offset, Fmm_stride, Fmm_offset;
02277   double *dl;
02278   double *dl8 = NULL;
02279   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
02280   int w_offset;
02281   complex double *expsm, *expsmm;
02282   int exps_offset;
02283   int elmmsign, elssign;
02284   int spinneg;
02285   int Gmm_stride, Gmm_offset;
02286 
02287   // Allocate memory.
02288   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
02289   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
02290   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
02291   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
02292   expsm = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
02293   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(expsm)
02294   expsmm = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
02295   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(expsmm)
02296   inds = (int*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(int));
02297   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
02298 
02299   // Perform precomputations.
02300   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
02301     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
02302   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
02303     signs[m]   =  1.0;
02304     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
02305   }
02306   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
02307   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
02308   exps_offset = L-1;
02309   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++)
02310     expsm[m + exps_offset] = cexp(I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
02311   for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
02312     expsmm[mm + exps_offset] = cexp(-I*mm*SSHT_PI/(2.0*L-1.0));
02313 
02314   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
02315   if (verbosity > 0) {
02316     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
02317            "Computing forward transform using MW symmetric sampling with ");
02318     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
02319            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
02320     if (verbosity > 1)
02321       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
02322              "Using routine ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_ss...");
02323   }
02324 
02325   // Compute Fourier transform over phi, i.e. compute Fmt.
02326   // Note that t and p indices of fext are increased in size by
02327   // one compared to usual sampling.
02328   Fmt = (complex double*)calloc((2*L)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
02329   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmt)
02330   Fmt_stride = 2*L;
02331   Fmt_offset = L-1;
02332   f_stride = 2*L;
02333   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L, sizeof(complex double));
02334   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
02335   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
02336   for (t=0; t<=L; t++) {
02337     memcpy(inout, &f[t*f_stride], f_stride*sizeof(double complex));
02338     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
02339     for(m=0; m<=L; m++) 
02340       Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride + t] = inout[m] / (2.0*L);
02341     for(m=-(L-1); m<=-1; m++) 
02342       Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride + t] = inout[m+2*L-1+1] / (2.0*L);
02343   }
02344   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
02345   free(inout);
02346 
02347   // Extend Fmt periodically.
02348   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L; m++) 
02349     for (t=L+1; t<=2*L-1; t++) 
02350       Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride + t] = 
02351         signs[abs(m)] * ssign * Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride + (2*L-t)];
02352 
02353   // Compute Fourier transform over theta, i.e. compute Fmm.
02354   // Note that m and mm indices are increased in size by one.
02355   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
02356   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
02357   Fmm_stride = 2*L;
02358   Fmm_offset = L-1;
02359   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L, sizeof(complex double));
02360   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
02361   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
02362   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L; m++) {
02363     memcpy(inout, &Fmt[(m+Fmt_offset)*Fmt_stride], Fmt_stride*sizeof(complex double));
02364     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
02365     for(mm=0; mm<=L; mm++) 
02366       Fmm[(m+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] = 
02367         inout[mm] / (2.0*L);
02368     for(mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
02369       Fmm[(m+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] = 
02370         inout[mm+2*L-1+1] / (2.0*L);
02371   }
02372   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
02373   free(inout);
02374 
02375   // Compute weights.
02376   w = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02377   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(w)
02378   w_offset = 2*(L-1);
02379   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
02380     w[mm+w_offset] = ssht_sampling_weight_mw(mm);
02381 
02382   // Compute IFFT of w to give wr.
02383   wr = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02384   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(wr)
02385   inout = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02386   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
02387   plan_bwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
02388   plan_fwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
02389   for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++) 
02390     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
02391   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++) 
02392     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02393   fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
02394   for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++) 
02395     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02396   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
02397     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
02398 
02399   // Compute Gmm by convolution implemented as product in real space.
02400   Fmm_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02401   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm_pad)
02402   tmp_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02403   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(tmp_pad)
02404   Gmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
02405   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Gmm)
02406   Gmm_stride = 2*L-1;
02407   Gmm_offset = L-1;
02408   for (m=-(L-1); m<=L-1; m++) {
02409 
02410     // Zero-pad Fmm.
02411     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-L; mm++)
02412       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
02413     for (mm=L; mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
02414       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
02415     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
02416       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = 
02417         Fmm[(m+Fmm_offset)*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset];
02418 
02419     // Compute IFFT of Fmm.
02420     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02421       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
02422     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
02423       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02424     fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
02425     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02426       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02427     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
02428       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
02429 
02430     // Compute product of Fmm and weight in real space.
02431     for (r=-2*(L-1); r<=2*(L-1); r++) 
02432       Fmm_pad[r + w_offset] *= wr[-r + w_offset];
02433 
02434     // Compute Gmm by FFT.
02435     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02436       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
02437     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
02438       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02439     fftw_execute_dft(plan_fwd, inout, inout);
02440     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02441       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02442     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
02443       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
02444 
02445     // Extract section of Gmm of interest.
02446     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
02447       Gmm[(mm+Gmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + m + Gmm_offset] = 
02448         Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] * 2.0 * SSHT_PI / (4.0*L-3.0);
02449 
02450   }
02451   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_bwd);
02452   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_fwd);
02453 
02454   // Compute flm.
02455   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
02456   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
02457   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
02458     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
02459     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
02460   }
02461   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
02462   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER); 
02463   inds_offset = L-1;
02464   for (el=0; el<=L-1; el++) {
02465     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) {
02466       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
02467       flm[ind] = 0.0;
02468     }
02469   }
02470   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
02471 
02472     // Compute Wigner plane.
02473     switch (dl_method) {
02474 
02475       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
02476         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
02477           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
02478             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
02479                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02480                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
02481           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
02482                                                        dl8, L,
02483                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02484                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02485                                                        el, 
02486                                                        signs);
02487         }
02488         else {
02489           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
02490                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02491                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
02492           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
02493                                                        dl8, L,
02494                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02495                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02496                                                        el, 
02497                                                        signs);
02498         }
02499         break;
02500   
02501       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
02502         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
02503           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
02504             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
02505                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02506                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
02507           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
02508                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02509                                                            el, signs);
02510         }
02511         else {
02512           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
02513                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02514                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
02515           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
02516                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02517                                                            el, signs);  
02518         }
02519         break;
02520 
02521       default:
02522         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method") 
02523     }
02524 
02525     // Compute flm.
02526     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
02527     el2pel = el *el + el;    
02528     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++)
02529       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
02530     elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : signs[el];
02531 
02532     for (m=-el; m<=-1; m++) {
02533       // mm = 0
02534       ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
02535       flm[ind] +=
02536         ssign 
02537         * elfactor
02538         * expsm[m + exps_offset]
02539         * signs[el] * dl[0*dl_stride - m + dl_offset]
02540         * elssign * dl[0*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
02541         * Gmm[(0+Gmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + m + Gmm_offset];
02542     }
02543     for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
02544       // mm = 0
02545       ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
02546       flm[ind] +=
02547         ssign 
02548         * elfactor
02549         * expsm[m + exps_offset]
02550         * dl[0*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
02551         * elssign * dl[0*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
02552         * Gmm[(0+Gmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + m + Gmm_offset];
02553     }
02554 
02555     for (mm=1; mm<=el; mm++) {
02556       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
02557       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
02558 
02559       for (m=-el; m<=-1; m++) {
02560         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
02561         flm[ind] +=
02562           ssign
02563           * elfactor
02564           * expsm[m + exps_offset]
02565           * elmmsign * dl[mm*dl_stride - m + dl_offset]
02566           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
02567           * ( Gmm[(mm+Gmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + m + Gmm_offset]
02568               + signs[-m] * ssign
02569               * Gmm[(-mm+Gmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + m + Gmm_offset]);
02570       }
02571       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
02572         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
02573         flm[ind] +=
02574           ssign 
02575           * elfactor
02576           * expsm[m + exps_offset]
02577           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
02578           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
02579           * ( Gmm[(mm+Gmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + m + Gmm_offset]
02580               + signs[m] * ssign
02581               * Gmm[(-mm+Gmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + m + Gmm_offset]);
02582       }
02583 
02584     }  
02585 
02586   }
02587 
02588   // Free memory.
02589   free(dl);
02590   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
02591     free(dl8);
02592   free(Fmt);
02593   free(Fmm);
02594   free(inout);
02595   free(w);
02596   free(wr);
02597   free(Fmm_pad);
02598   free(tmp_pad);
02599   free(Gmm);
02600   free(sqrt_tbl);
02601   free(signs); 
02602   free(expsm);
02603   free(expsmm);
02604   free(inds);
02605 
02606   // Print finished if verbosity set.
02607   if (verbosity > 0) 
02608     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Forward transform computed!");  
02609 
02610 }
02611 
02612 
02629 void ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_ss_real(complex double *flm, double *f, 
02630                                                int L, 
02631                                                ssht_dl_method_t dl_method, 
02632                                                int verbosity) {
02633 
02634   int el, m, mm, ind, ind_nm, t, r;
02635   int eltmp;
02636   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
02637   int el2pel, inds_offset;
02638   int *inds;
02639   double ssign, elfactor;
02640   fftw_plan plan, plan_bwd, plan_fwd;
02641   double *in_real;
02642   complex double *inout, *out;
02643   complex double *Fmt, *Fmm, *Gmm;
02644   complex double *w, *wr;
02645   complex double *Fmm_pad, *tmp_pad;
02646   int f_stride, Fmt_stride, Fmt_offset, Fmm_stride, Fmm_offset, Gmm_stride;
02647   double *dl;
02648   double *dl8 = NULL;
02649   int dl_offset, dl_stride;
02650   int w_offset;
02651   complex double *expsm;
02652   int exps_offset;
02653   int elmmsign, elssign;
02654   int spinneg;
02655   int spin = 0;
02656 
02657   // Allocate memory.
02658   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
02659   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
02660   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
02661   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
02662   expsm = (complex double*)calloc(L, sizeof(complex double));
02663   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(expsm)
02664   inds = (int*)calloc(L, sizeof(int));
02665   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
02666 
02667   // Perform precomputations.
02668   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
02669     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
02670   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
02671     signs[m]   =  1.0;
02672     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
02673   }
02674   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
02675   spinneg = spin <= 0 ? spin : -spin;
02676   exps_offset = L-1;
02677   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
02678     expsm[m] = cexp(I*SSHT_PION2*(m+spin));
02679 
02680   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
02681   if (verbosity > 0) {
02682     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
02683            "Computing forward transform using MW symmetric sampling with ");
02684     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
02685            L, ",", spin, ", TRUE)");
02686     if (verbosity > 1)
02687       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
02688              "Using routine ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_ss_real...");
02689   }
02690 
02691   // Compute Fourier transform over phi, i.e. compute Fmt.
02692   // Note that t and p indices of fext are increased in size by
02693   // one compared to usual sampling.
02694   Fmt = (complex double*)calloc((L+1)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
02695   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmt)
02696   Fmt_stride = 2*L;
02697   Fmt_offset = L-1;
02698   f_stride = 2*L;
02699   in_real = (double*)calloc(2*L, sizeof(double));
02700   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(in_real)
02701   out = (complex double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(complex double));
02702   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(out)
02703   plan = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_1d(2*L, in_real, out, FFTW_MEASURE);
02704   for (t=0; t<=L; t++) {
02705     memcpy(in_real, &f[t*f_stride], f_stride*sizeof(double));
02706         fftw_execute_dft_r2c(plan, in_real, out);
02707     for(m=0; m<=L; m++) 
02708       Fmt[m*Fmt_stride + t] = out[m] / (2.0*L);
02709 
02710   }
02711   free(in_real);
02712   free(out);
02713   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
02714 
02715   // Extend Fmt periodically.
02716   for (m=0; m<=L; m++) 
02717     for (t=L+1; t<=2*L-1; t++) 
02718       Fmt[m*Fmt_stride + t] = 
02719         signs[abs(m)] * ssign * Fmt[m*Fmt_stride + (2*L-t)];
02720 
02721   // Compute Fourier transform over theta, i.e. compute Fmm.
02722   // Note that m and mm indices are increased in size by one.
02723   Fmm = (complex double*)calloc((L+1)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
02724   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm)
02725   Fmm_stride = 2*L;
02726   Fmm_offset = L-1;
02727   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L, sizeof(complex double));
02728   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
02729   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
02730   for (m=0; m<=L; m++) {
02731     memcpy(inout, &Fmt[m*Fmt_stride], Fmt_stride*sizeof(complex double));
02732     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
02733     for(mm=0; mm<=L; mm++) 
02734       Fmm[m*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] = 
02735         inout[mm] / (2.0*L);
02736     for(mm=-(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
02737       Fmm[m*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset] = 
02738         inout[mm+2*L-1+1] / (2.0*L);
02739   }
02740   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
02741   free(inout);
02742 
02743   // Compute weights.
02744   w = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02745   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(w)
02746   w_offset = 2*(L-1);
02747   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
02748     w[mm+w_offset] = ssht_sampling_weight_mw(mm);
02749 
02750   // Compute IFFT of w to give wr.
02751   wr = (double complex*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02752   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(wr)
02753   inout = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02754   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
02755   plan_bwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
02756   plan_fwd = fftw_plan_dft_1d(4*L-3, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
02757   for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++) 
02758     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
02759   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++) 
02760     inout[mm + w_offset] = w[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02761   fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
02762   for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++) 
02763     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02764   for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++) 
02765     wr[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
02766 
02767   // Compute Gmm by convolution implemented as product in real space.
02768   Fmm_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02769   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Fmm_pad)
02770   tmp_pad = (complex double*)calloc(4*L-3, sizeof(complex double));
02771   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(tmp_pad)
02772   Gmm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L-1)*L, sizeof(complex double));
02773   Gmm_stride = L;
02774   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Gmm)
02775   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++) {
02776 
02777     // Zero-pad Fmm.
02778     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-L; mm++)
02779       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
02780     for (mm=L; mm<=2*(L-1); mm++)
02781       Fmm_pad[mm+w_offset] = 0.0;
02782     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
02783       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = 
02784         Fmm[m*Fmm_stride + mm + Fmm_offset];
02785 
02786     // Compute IFFT of Fmm.
02787     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02788       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
02789     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
02790       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02791     fftw_execute_dft(plan_bwd, inout, inout);
02792     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02793       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02794     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
02795       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
02796 
02797     // Compute product of Fmm and weight in real space.
02798     for (r=-2*(L-1); r<=2*(L-1); r++) 
02799       Fmm_pad[r + w_offset] *= wr[-r + w_offset];
02800 
02801     // Compute Gmm by FFT.
02802     for (mm=1; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02803       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm - 2*(L-1) - 1 + w_offset];
02804     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=0; mm++)
02805       inout[mm + w_offset] = Fmm_pad[mm + 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02806     fftw_execute_dft(plan_fwd, inout, inout);
02807     for (mm=0; mm<=2*L-2; mm++)
02808       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm - 2*(L-1) + w_offset];
02809     for (mm=-2*(L-1); mm<=-1; mm++)
02810       Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] = inout[mm + 2*(L-1) + 1 + w_offset];
02811 
02812     // Extract section of Gmm of interest.
02813     for (mm=-(L-1); mm<=L-1; mm++)
02814       Gmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + m] = 
02815         Fmm_pad[mm + w_offset] * 2.0 * SSHT_PI / (4.0*L-3.0);
02816 
02817   }
02818   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_bwd);
02819   fftw_destroy_plan(plan_fwd);
02820 
02821   // Compute flm.
02822   dl = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
02823   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl)
02824   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO) {
02825     dl8 = ssht_dl_calloc(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED);
02826     SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl8)
02827   }
02828   dl_offset = ssht_dl_get_offset(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER);
02829   dl_stride = ssht_dl_get_stride(L, SSHT_DL_QUARTER); 
02830   inds_offset = 0;
02831   for (el=0; el<=L-1; el++) {
02832     for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
02833       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
02834       flm[ind] = 0.0;
02835     }
02836   }
02837   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
02838 
02839     // Compute Wigner plane.
02840     switch (dl_method) {
02841 
02842       case SSHT_DL_RISBO:
02843         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
02844           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
02845             ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
02846                                             SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02847                                             eltmp, sqrt_tbl, signs);
02848           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
02849                                                        dl8, L,
02850                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02851                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02852                                                        el, 
02853                                                        signs);
02854         }
02855         else {
02856           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_eighth_table(dl8, SSHT_PION2, L, 
02857                                           SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02858                                           el, sqrt_tbl, signs);
02859           ssht_dl_beta_risbo_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, 
02860                                                        dl8, L,
02861                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02862                                                        SSHT_DL_QUARTER_EXTENDED,
02863                                                        el, 
02864                                                        signs);
02865         }
02866         break;
02867   
02868       case SSHT_DL_TRAPANI:
02869         if (el!=0 && el==abs(spin)) {
02870           for(eltmp=0; eltmp<=abs(spin); eltmp++)
02871             ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
02872                                                 SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02873                                                 eltmp, sqrt_tbl);
02874           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
02875                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02876                                                            el, signs);
02877         }
02878         else {
02879           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_eighth_table(dl, L,
02880                                               SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02881                                               el, sqrt_tbl);
02882           ssht_dl_halfpi_trapani_fill_eighth2quarter_table(dl, L,
02883                                                            SSHT_DL_QUARTER,
02884                                                            el, signs);  
02885         }
02886         break;
02887 
02888       default:
02889         SSHT_ERROR_GENERIC("Invalid dl method") 
02890     }
02891 
02892     // Compute flm.
02893     elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
02894     el2pel = el *el + el;    
02895     for (m=0; m<=el; m++)
02896       inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
02897     elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : signs[el];
02898 
02899     for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
02900       // mm = 0
02901       ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
02902       flm[ind] +=
02903         ssign 
02904         * elfactor
02905         * expsm[m]
02906         * dl[0*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
02907         * elssign * dl[0*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
02908         * Gmm[(0+Fmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + m];
02909     }
02910 
02911     for (mm=1; mm<=el; mm++) {
02912       elmmsign = signs[el] * signs[mm];
02913       elssign = spin <= 0 ? 1.0 : elmmsign;
02914 
02915       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
02916         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
02917         flm[ind] +=
02918           ssign 
02919           * elfactor
02920           * expsm[m]
02921           * dl[mm*dl_stride + m + dl_offset]
02922           * elssign * dl[mm*dl_stride - spinneg + dl_offset]
02923           * ( Gmm[(mm+Fmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + m]
02924               + signs[m] * ssign
02925               * Gmm[(-mm+Fmm_offset)*Gmm_stride + m]);
02926       }
02927 
02928     }  
02929 
02930   }
02931 
02932   // Set flm values for negative m using conjugate symmetry.
02933   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
02934     for (m=1; m<=el; m++) {
02935       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
02936       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind_nm, el, -m);
02937       flm[ind_nm] = signs[m] * conj(flm[ind]);
02938     }
02939   }
02940 
02941   // Free memory.
02942   free(dl);
02943   if (dl_method == SSHT_DL_RISBO)
02944     free(dl8);
02945   free(Fmt);
02946   free(Fmm);
02947   free(inout);
02948   free(w);
02949   free(wr);
02950   free(Fmm_pad);
02951   free(tmp_pad);
02952   free(Gmm);
02953   free(sqrt_tbl);
02954   free(signs); 
02955   free(expsm);
02956   free(inds);
02957 
02958   // Print finished if verbosity set.
02959   if (verbosity > 0) 
02960     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Forward transform computed!");  
02961 
02962 }
02963 
02964 
02965 //============================================================================
02966 // MW SS Noth-South pole interfaces
02967 //============================================================================
02968 
02969 
02993 void ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss_pole(complex double *f, 
02994                                           complex double *f_np, double *phi_np,
02995                                           complex double *f_sp, double *phi_sp,
02996                                           complex double *flm, 
02997                                           int L, int spin, 
02998                                           ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
02999                                           int verbosity) {
03000 
03001   complex double* f_full;
03002   int t, f_stride = 2*L;
03003 
03004   // Allocate full array.
03005   f_full = (complex double*)calloc((L+1)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
03006   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
03007 
03008   // Perform inverse transform.
03009   ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss(f_full, flm, L, spin, 
03010                                   dl_method, verbosity);          
03011 
03012   // Copy output function values, including separate points for  poles.
03013  for (t=1; t<=L-1; t++)
03014    memcpy(&f[(t-1)*f_stride], &f_full[t*f_stride], 
03015           (2*L)*sizeof(complex double));
03016   *f_np = f_full[0];
03017   *phi_np = ssht_sampling_mw_ss_p2phi(0, L);
03018   *f_sp = f_full[L*f_stride + 0];
03019   *phi_sp = ssht_sampling_mw_ss_p2phi(0, L);
03020         
03021   // Free memory.
03022   free(f_full);
03023 
03024 }
03025 
03026 
03045 void ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss_real_pole(double *f, 
03046                                                double *f_np,
03047                                                double *f_sp,
03048                                                complex double *flm, 
03049                                                int L, 
03050                                                ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
03051                                                int verbosity) {
03052 
03053   double *f_full;
03054   int t, f_stride = 2*L;
03055 
03056   // Allocate full array.
03057   f_full = (double*)calloc((L+1)*(2*L), sizeof(double));
03058   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
03059 
03060   // Perform inverse transform.
03061   ssht_core_mw_inverse_sov_sym_ss_real(f_full, flm, L, 
03062                                        dl_method, verbosity);
03063 
03064   // Copy output function values, including separate points for  poles.
03065   for (t=1; t<=L-1; t++)
03066    memcpy(&f[(t-1)*f_stride], &f_full[t*f_stride], 
03067           (2*L)*sizeof(double));
03068   *f_np = f_full[0];
03069   *f_sp = f_full[L*f_stride + 0];
03070 
03071   // Free memory.
03072   free(f_full);
03073 
03074 }
03075 
03076 
03100 void ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_ss_pole(complex double *flm, complex double *f,
03101                                                complex double f_np, double phi_np,
03102                                                complex double f_sp, double phi_sp,
03103                                                int L, int spin, 
03104                                                ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
03105                                                int verbosity) {
03106 
03107   complex double *f_full;
03108   int t, p, f_stride = 2*L;
03109   double phi;
03110 
03111   // Copy function values to full array.
03112   f_full = (complex double*)calloc((L+1)*(2*L), sizeof(complex double));
03113   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
03114   for (t=1; t<=L-1; t++)
03115     memcpy(&f_full[t*f_stride], &f[(t-1)*f_stride], 
03116            (2*L)*sizeof(complex double));
03117 
03118   // Define poles for all phi.
03119   for (p=0; p<=2*L-1; p++) {
03120     phi = ssht_sampling_mw_ss_p2phi(p, L);
03121     f_full[0*f_stride + p] = f_np * cexp(-I*spin*(phi-phi_np)); 
03122     f_full[L*f_stride + p] = f_sp * cexp(I*spin*(phi-phi_sp)); 
03123   }
03124 
03125   // Perform forward transform.
03126   ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_ss(flm, f_full, L, spin, 
03127                                        dl_method, verbosity);
03128 
03129   // Free memory.
03130   free(f_full);
03131 
03132 }
03133 
03134 
03153 void ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_ss_real_pole(complex double *flm, 
03154                                                     double *f, 
03155                                                     double f_np,
03156                                                     double f_sp,
03157                                                     int L, 
03158                                                     ssht_dl_method_t dl_method,
03159                                                     int verbosity) {
03160 
03161   double *f_full;
03162   int t, p, f_stride = 2*L;
03163 
03164   // Copy function values to full array.
03165   f_full = (double*)calloc((L+1)*(2*L), sizeof(double));
03166   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(f_full)
03167   for (t=1; t<=L-1; t++)
03168     memcpy(&f_full[t*f_stride], &f[(t-1)*f_stride], 
03169            (2*L)*sizeof(double));
03170 
03171   // Define poles for all phi.
03172   for (p=0; p<=2*L-1; p++) {
03173     f_full[0*f_stride + p] = f_np; 
03174     f_full[L*f_stride + p] = f_sp; 
03175   }
03176 
03177   // Perform forward transform.
03178   ssht_core_mw_forward_sov_conv_sym_ss_real(flm, f_full, L, 
03179                                             dl_method, verbosity);
03180 
03181   // Free memory.
03182   free(f_full);
03183 
03184 }
03185 
03186 
03187 //============================================================================
03188 // GL algorithms
03189 //============================================================================
03190 
03191 
03205 void ssht_core_gl_inverse_sov(complex double *f, complex double *flm, 
03206                               int L, int spin, int verbosity) {
03207 
03208   int t, p, m, el, ind;
03209   int ftm_stride, ftm_offset, f_stride;
03210   double *dlm1p1_line,  *dl_line;
03211   double *dl_ptr;
03212   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
03213   complex double *ftm, *inout;
03214   double theta, ssign, elfactor;
03215   fftw_plan plan;
03216   double *thetas, *weights;
03217 
03218   // Allocate memory.
03219   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
03220   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
03221   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
03222   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
03223 
03224   // Perform precomputations.
03225   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
03226     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
03227   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
03228     signs[m]   =  1.0;
03229     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
03230   }
03231   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
03232 
03233   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
03234   if (verbosity > 0) {
03235     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
03236            "Computing inverse transform using GL sampling with ");
03237     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
03238            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
03239     if (verbosity > 1)
03240       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
03241              "Using routine ssht_core_gl_inverse_sov...");
03242   }
03243 
03244   // Compute weights and theta positions.
03245   thetas = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
03246   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(thetas)
03247   weights = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
03248   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(weights)
03249   ssht_sampling_gl_thetas_weights(thetas, weights, L);
03250 
03251   // Compute ftm.
03252   ftm = (complex double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
03253   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(ftm)  
03254   ftm_stride = 2*L-1;
03255   ftm_offset = L-1;
03256   dlm1p1_line = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
03257   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dlm1p1_line)
03258   dl_line = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
03259   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl_line)
03260   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
03261     theta = thetas[t];
03262     for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) { 
03263       elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
03264 
03265       // Compute dl line for given spin.
03266       ssht_dl_beta_kostelec_line_table(dlm1p1_line, dl_line,
03267                                        theta, L, -spin, el,
03268                                        sqrt_tbl, signs);
03269       // Switch current and previous dls.
03270       dl_ptr = dl_line;
03271       dl_line = dlm1p1_line;
03272       dlm1p1_line = dl_ptr;
03273     
03274       for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) { 
03275         ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
03276         ftm[t*ftm_stride + m + ftm_offset] +=
03277           ssign 
03278           * elfactor
03279           * dl_line[m + L-1]
03280           * flm[ind];
03281       }
03282     }
03283   }
03284 
03285   // Free dl memory.
03286   free(dlm1p1_line);
03287   free(dl_line);
03288 
03289   // Free memory for thetas and weights.
03290   free(thetas);
03291   free(weights);
03292 
03293   // Compute f.   
03294   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
03295   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
03296   f_stride = 2*L-1;
03297   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L-1, inout, inout, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
03298   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
03299     for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
03300       inout[m] = ftm[t*ftm_stride + m + ftm_offset];
03301     for (m=-(L-1); m<=-1; m++)
03302       inout[m+2*L-1] = ftm[t*ftm_stride + m + ftm_offset];
03303     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
03304     for (p=0; p<=2*L-2; p++)
03305       f[t*f_stride + p] = inout[p];
03306   }
03307   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
03308 
03309   // Free memory.  
03310   free(ftm);
03311   free(inout);
03312   free(signs);
03313   free(sqrt_tbl);
03314   
03315   // Print finished if verbosity set.
03316   if (verbosity > 0) 
03317     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Inverse transform computed!");  
03318 
03319 }
03320 
03321 
03336 void ssht_core_gl_inverse_sov_real(double *f, complex double *flm, 
03337                                    int L, int verbosity) {
03338 
03339   int t, p, m, el, ind;
03340   int ftm_stride, ftm_offset, f_stride;
03341   double *dlm1p1_line,  *dl_line;
03342   double *dl_ptr;
03343   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
03344   complex double *ftm;
03345   complex double *in;
03346   double *out;
03347   double theta, ssign, elfactor;
03348   fftw_plan plan;
03349   double *thetas, *weights;
03350   int spin = 0;
03351 
03352   // Allocate memory.
03353   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
03354   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
03355   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
03356   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
03357 
03358   // Perform precomputations.
03359   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
03360     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
03361   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
03362     signs[m]   =  1.0;
03363     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
03364   }
03365   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
03366 
03367   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
03368   if (verbosity > 0) {
03369     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
03370            "Computing inverse transform using GL sampling with ");
03371     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
03372            L, ",", spin, ", TRUE)");
03373     if (verbosity > 1)
03374       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
03375              "Using routine ssht_core_gl_inverse_sov_real...");
03376   }
03377 
03378   // Compute weights and theta positions.
03379   thetas = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
03380   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(thetas)
03381   weights = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
03382   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(weights)
03383   ssht_sampling_gl_thetas_weights(thetas, weights, L);
03384 
03385   // Compute ftm.
03386   ftm = (complex double*)calloc(L*L, sizeof(complex double));
03387   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(ftm)  
03388   ftm_stride = L;
03389   ftm_offset = 0;
03390   dlm1p1_line = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
03391   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dlm1p1_line)
03392   dl_line = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
03393   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl_line)
03394   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
03395     theta = thetas[t];
03396     for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) { 
03397       elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
03398 
03399       // Compute half dl line for given spin.     
03400       ssht_dl_beta_kostelec_halfline_table(dlm1p1_line, dl_line,
03401                                            theta, L, -spin, el,
03402                                            sqrt_tbl, signs);
03403       // Switch current and previous dls.
03404       dl_ptr = dl_line;
03405       dl_line = dlm1p1_line;
03406       dlm1p1_line = dl_ptr;
03407     
03408       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {   
03409         ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
03410         ftm[t*ftm_stride + m + ftm_offset] +=
03411           ssign 
03412           * elfactor
03413           * dl_line[m]
03414           * flm[ind];
03415       }
03416     }
03417   }
03418 
03419   // Free dl memory.
03420   free(dlm1p1_line);
03421   free(dl_line);
03422 
03423   // Free memory for thetas and weights.
03424   free(thetas);
03425   free(weights);
03426 
03427   // Compute f.   
03428   in = (complex double*)calloc(L, sizeof(complex double));
03429   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(in)
03430   out = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
03431   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(out)
03432   plan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_1d(2*L-1, in, out, FFTW_MEASURE);
03433   f_stride = 2*L-1;
03434   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
03435     memcpy(in, &ftm[t*ftm_stride], L*sizeof(complex double));
03436     fftw_execute_dft_c2r(plan, in, out);
03437     for (p=0; p<=2*L-2; p++)
03438       f[t*f_stride + p] = out[p];
03439   }
03440   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
03441 
03442   // Free memory.  
03443   free(ftm);
03444   free(in);
03445   free(out);
03446   free(signs);
03447   free(sqrt_tbl);
03448   
03449   // Print finished if verbosity set.
03450   if (verbosity > 0) 
03451     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Inverse transform computed!");  
03452 
03453 }
03454 
03455 
03469 void ssht_core_gl_forward_sov(complex double *flm, complex double *f, 
03470                               int L, int spin, int verbosity) {
03471 
03472   int t, m, el, ind;
03473   int f_stride;  
03474   double *dlm1p1_line,  *dl_line;
03475   double *dl_ptr;
03476   int el2pel, inds_offset;
03477   int *inds;
03478   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
03479   int Ftm_stride, Ftm_offset;
03480   complex double *Ftm, *inout;
03481   double theta, ssign, elfactor;
03482   fftw_plan plan;
03483   double *thetas, *weights;
03484   double w;
03485 
03486    // Allocate memory.
03487   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
03488   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
03489   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
03490   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
03491   inds = (int*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(int));
03492   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
03493 
03494   // Perform precomputations.
03495   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
03496     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
03497   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
03498     signs[m]   =  1.0;
03499     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
03500   }
03501   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
03502 
03503   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
03504   if (verbosity > 0) {
03505     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
03506            "Computing forward transform using GL sampling with ");
03507     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
03508            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
03509     if (verbosity > 1)
03510       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
03511              "Using routine ssht_core_gl_forward_sov...");
03512   }
03513 
03514   // Compute weights and theta positions.
03515   thetas = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
03516   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(thetas)
03517   weights = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
03518   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(weights)
03519   ssht_sampling_gl_thetas_weights(thetas, weights, L);
03520 
03521   // Compute Fourier transform over phi, i.e. compute Ftm.
03522   Ftm = (complex double*)calloc(L*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
03523   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Ftm)
03524   Ftm_stride = 2*L-1;
03525   Ftm_offset = L-1;
03526   f_stride = 2*L-1;
03527   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
03528   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
03529   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L-1, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
03530   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
03531     memcpy(inout, &f[t*f_stride], f_stride*sizeof(double complex));
03532     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
03533     for(m=0; m<=L-1; m++) 
03534       Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset] = 
03535         inout[m] * 2.0 * SSHT_PI / (2.0*L-1.0) ;
03536     for(m=-(L-1); m<=-1; m++) 
03537       Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset] = 
03538         inout[m+2*L-1] * 2.0 * SSHT_PI / (2.0*L-1.0);
03539   }
03540   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
03541 
03542   // Compute flm.
03543   dlm1p1_line = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
03544   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dlm1p1_line)
03545   dl_line = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
03546   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl_line)
03547   inds_offset = L-1;
03548   for (el=0; el<=L-1; el++) {
03549     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) {
03550       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
03551       flm[ind] = 0.0;
03552     }
03553   }
03554   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
03555     theta = thetas[t];
03556     w = weights[t];
03557     for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
03558       elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
03559       el2pel = el *el + el;    
03560       for (m=-el; m<=el; m++)
03561         inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
03562 
03563       // Compute dl line for given spin.
03564       ssht_dl_beta_kostelec_line_table(dlm1p1_line, dl_line,
03565                                        theta, L, -spin, el,
03566                                        sqrt_tbl, signs);
03567       // Switch current and previous dls.
03568       dl_ptr = dl_line;
03569       dl_line = dlm1p1_line;
03570       dlm1p1_line = dl_ptr;
03571 
03572       for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) {
03573         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
03574         flm[ind] += 
03575           ssign
03576           * elfactor
03577           * w
03578           * dl_line[m+L-1]
03579           * Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset];
03580       }
03581     }
03582   }
03583 
03584   // Free memory.
03585   free(dlm1p1_line);
03586   free(dl_line);
03587   free(thetas);
03588   free(weights);
03589   free(Ftm);
03590   free(inout);
03591   free(signs);
03592   free(sqrt_tbl);
03593   free(inds);
03594 
03595   // Print finished if verbosity set.
03596   if (verbosity > 0) 
03597     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Forward transform computed!");  
03598 
03599 }
03600 
03601 
03616 void ssht_core_gl_forward_sov_real(complex double *flm, double *f, 
03617                                    int L, int verbosity) {
03618 
03619   int t, m, el, ind, ind_nm;
03620   int f_stride;  
03621   double *dlm1p1_line,  *dl_line;
03622   double *dl_ptr;
03623   int el2pel, inds_offset;
03624   int *inds;
03625   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
03626   int Ftm_stride, Ftm_offset;
03627   complex double *Ftm;
03628   double *in_real;
03629   complex double *out;
03630   double theta, ssign, elfactor;
03631   fftw_plan plan;
03632   double *thetas, *weights;
03633   double w;
03634   int spin = 0;
03635 
03636    // Allocate memory.
03637   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
03638   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
03639   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
03640   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
03641   inds = (int*)calloc(L, sizeof(int));
03642   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
03643 
03644   // Perform precomputations.
03645   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
03646     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
03647   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
03648     signs[m]   =  1.0;
03649     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
03650   }
03651   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
03652 
03653  // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
03654   if (verbosity > 0) {
03655     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
03656            "Computing forward transform using GL sampling with ");
03657     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
03658            L, ",", spin, ", TRUE)");
03659     if (verbosity > 1)
03660       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
03661              "Using routine ssht_core_gl_forward_sov_real...");
03662   }
03663 
03664   // Compute weights and theta positions.
03665   thetas = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
03666   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(thetas)
03667   weights = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
03668   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(weights)
03669   ssht_sampling_gl_thetas_weights(thetas, weights, L);
03670 
03671   // Compute Fourier transform over phi, i.e. compute Ftm.
03672   Ftm = (complex double*)calloc(L*L, sizeof(complex double));
03673   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Ftm)
03674   Ftm_stride = L;
03675   Ftm_offset = 0;
03676   f_stride = 2*L-1;
03677   in_real = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
03678   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(in_real)
03679   out = (complex double*)calloc(L, sizeof(complex double));
03680   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(out)
03681   plan = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_1d(2*L-1, in_real, out, FFTW_MEASURE);
03682   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
03683     memcpy(in_real, &f[t*f_stride], f_stride*sizeof(double));
03684     fftw_execute_dft_r2c(plan, in_real, out);
03685     for(m=0; m<=L-1; m++) 
03686       Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset] = 
03687         out[m] * 2.0 * SSHT_PI / (2.0*L-1.0);
03688   }
03689   free(in_real);
03690   free(out);
03691   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
03692 
03693   // Compute flm.
03694   dlm1p1_line = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
03695   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dlm1p1_line)
03696   dl_line = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
03697   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl_line)
03698   inds_offset = 0;
03699   for (el=0; el<=L-1; el++) {
03700     for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
03701       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
03702       flm[ind] = 0.0;
03703     }
03704   }
03705   for (t=0; t<=L-1; t++) {
03706     theta = thetas[t];
03707     w = weights[t];
03708     for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
03709       elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
03710       el2pel = el *el + el;    
03711       for (m=0; m<=el; m++)
03712         inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
03713 
03714       // Compute half dl line for given spin.
03715       ssht_dl_beta_kostelec_halfline_table(dlm1p1_line, dl_line,
03716                                            theta, L, -spin, el,
03717                                            sqrt_tbl, signs);
03718 
03719       // Switch current and previous dls.
03720       dl_ptr = dl_line;
03721       dl_line = dlm1p1_line;
03722       dlm1p1_line = dl_ptr;
03723 
03724       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
03725         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
03726         flm[ind] += 
03727           ssign
03728           * elfactor
03729           * w
03730           * dl_line[m]
03731           * Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset];
03732       }
03733     }
03734   }
03735 
03736   // Set flm values for negative m using conjugate symmetry.
03737   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
03738     for (m=1; m<=el; m++) {
03739       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
03740       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind_nm, el, -m);
03741       flm[ind_nm] = signs[m] * conj(flm[ind]);
03742     }
03743   }
03744 
03745   // Free memory.
03746   free(dlm1p1_line);
03747   free(dl_line);
03748   free(thetas);
03749   free(weights);
03750   free(Ftm);
03751   free(signs);
03752   free(sqrt_tbl);
03753   free(inds);
03754 
03755   // Print finished if verbosity set.
03756   if (verbosity > 0) 
03757     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Forward transform computed!");  
03758 
03759 }
03760 
03761 
03762 //============================================================================
03763 // DH algorithms
03764 //============================================================================
03765 
03766 
03780 void ssht_core_dh_inverse_sov(complex double *f, complex double *flm, 
03781                               int L, int spin, int verbosity) {
03782 
03783   int t, p, m, el, ind;
03784   int ftm_stride, ftm_offset, f_stride;
03785   double *dlm1p1_line,  *dl_line;
03786   double *dl_ptr;
03787   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
03788   complex double *ftm, *inout;
03789   double theta, ssign, elfactor;
03790   fftw_plan plan;
03791 
03792   // Allocate memory.
03793   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
03794   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
03795   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
03796   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
03797 
03798   // Perform precomputations.
03799   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
03800     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
03801   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
03802     signs[m]   =  1.0;
03803     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
03804   }
03805   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
03806 
03807   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
03808   if (verbosity > 0) {
03809     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
03810            "Computing inverse transform using DH sampling with ");
03811     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
03812            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
03813     if (verbosity > 1)
03814       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
03815              "Using routine ssht_core_dh_inverse_sov...");
03816   }
03817 
03818   // Compute ftm.
03819   ftm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
03820   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(ftm)  
03821   ftm_stride = 2*L-1;
03822   ftm_offset = L-1;
03823   dlm1p1_line = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
03824   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dlm1p1_line)
03825   dl_line = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
03826   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl_line)
03827   for (t=0; t<=2*L-1; t++) {
03828     theta = ssht_sampling_dh_t2theta(t, L);
03829     for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) { 
03830       elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
03831 
03832       // Compute dl line for given spin.
03833       ssht_dl_beta_kostelec_line_table(dlm1p1_line, dl_line,
03834                                        theta, L, -spin, el,
03835                                        sqrt_tbl, signs);
03836       // Switch current and previous dls.
03837       dl_ptr = dl_line;
03838       dl_line = dlm1p1_line;
03839       dlm1p1_line = dl_ptr;
03840     
03841       for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) { 
03842         ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
03843         ftm[t*ftm_stride + m + ftm_offset] +=
03844           ssign 
03845           * elfactor
03846           * dl_line[m + L-1]
03847           * flm[ind];
03848       }
03849     }
03850   }
03851 
03852   // Free dl memory.
03853   free(dlm1p1_line);
03854   free(dl_line);
03855 
03856   // Compute f.   
03857   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
03858   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
03859   f_stride = 2*L-1;
03860   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L-1, inout, inout, FFTW_BACKWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
03861   for (t=0; t<=2*L-1; t++) {
03862     for (m=0; m<=L-1; m++)
03863       inout[m] = ftm[t*ftm_stride + m + ftm_offset];
03864     for (m=-(L-1); m<=-1; m++)
03865       inout[m+2*L-1] = ftm[t*ftm_stride + m + ftm_offset];
03866     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
03867     for (p=0; p<=2*L-2; p++)
03868       f[t*f_stride + p] = inout[p];
03869   }
03870   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
03871 
03872   // Free memory.  
03873   free(ftm);
03874   free(inout);
03875   free(signs);
03876   free(sqrt_tbl);
03877   
03878   // Print finished if verbosity set.
03879   if (verbosity > 0) 
03880     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Inverse transform computed!");  
03881 
03882 }
03883 
03884 
03899 void ssht_core_dh_inverse_sov_real(double *f, complex double *flm, 
03900                                    int L, int verbosity) {
03901 
03902   int t, p, m, el, ind;
03903   int ftm_stride, ftm_offset, f_stride;
03904   double *dlm1p1_line,  *dl_line;
03905   double *dl_ptr;
03906   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
03907   complex double *ftm;
03908   complex double *in;
03909   double *out;
03910   double theta, ssign, elfactor;
03911   fftw_plan plan;
03912   int spin = 0;
03913 
03914   // Allocate memory.
03915   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
03916   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
03917   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
03918   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
03919 
03920   // Perform precomputations.
03921   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
03922     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
03923   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
03924     signs[m]   =  1.0;
03925     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
03926   }
03927   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
03928 
03929   // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
03930   if (verbosity > 0) {
03931     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
03932            "Computing inverse transform using DH sampling with ");
03933     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
03934            L, ",", spin, ", TRUE)");
03935     if (verbosity > 1)
03936       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
03937              "Using routine ssht_core_dh_inverse_sov_real...");
03938   }
03939 
03940   // Compute ftm.
03941   ftm = (complex double*)calloc(2*L*L, sizeof(complex double));
03942   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(ftm)  
03943   ftm_stride = L;
03944   ftm_offset = 0;
03945   dlm1p1_line = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
03946   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dlm1p1_line)
03947   dl_line = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
03948   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl_line)
03949   for (t=0; t<=2*L-1; t++) {
03950     theta = ssht_sampling_dh_t2theta(t, L);
03951     for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) { 
03952       elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
03953 
03954       // Compute half dl line for given spin.     
03955       ssht_dl_beta_kostelec_halfline_table(dlm1p1_line, dl_line,
03956                                            theta, L, -spin, el,
03957                                            sqrt_tbl, signs);
03958       // Switch current and previous dls.
03959       dl_ptr = dl_line;
03960       dl_line = dlm1p1_line;
03961       dlm1p1_line = dl_ptr;
03962     
03963       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {   
03964         ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
03965         ftm[t*ftm_stride + m + ftm_offset] +=
03966           ssign 
03967           * elfactor
03968           * dl_line[m]
03969           * flm[ind];
03970       }
03971     }
03972   }
03973 
03974   // Free dl memory.
03975   free(dlm1p1_line);
03976   free(dl_line);
03977 
03978   // Compute f.   
03979   in = (complex double*)calloc(L, sizeof(complex double));
03980   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(in)
03981   out = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
03982   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(out)
03983   plan = fftw_plan_dft_c2r_1d(2*L-1, in, out, FFTW_MEASURE);
03984   f_stride = 2*L-1;
03985   for (t=0; t<=2*L-1; t++) {
03986     memcpy(in, &ftm[t*ftm_stride], L*sizeof(complex double));
03987     fftw_execute_dft_c2r(plan, in, out);
03988     for (p=0; p<=2*L-2; p++)
03989       f[t*f_stride + p] = out[p];
03990   }
03991   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
03992 
03993   // Free memory.  
03994   free(ftm);
03995   free(in);
03996   free(out);
03997   free(signs);
03998   free(sqrt_tbl);
03999   
04000   // Print finished if verbosity set.
04001   if (verbosity > 0) 
04002     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Inverse transform computed!");  
04003 
04004 }
04005 
04006 
04020 void ssht_core_dh_forward_sov(complex double *flm, complex double *f, 
04021                               int L, int spin, int verbosity) {
04022 
04023   int t, m, el, ind;
04024   int f_stride;  
04025   double *dlm1p1_line,  *dl_line;
04026   double *dl_ptr;
04027   int el2pel, inds_offset;
04028   int *inds;
04029   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
04030   int Ftm_stride, Ftm_offset;
04031   complex double *Ftm, *inout;
04032   double theta, ssign, elfactor;
04033   fftw_plan plan;
04034   double w;
04035 
04036    // Allocate memory.
04037   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
04038   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
04039   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
04040   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
04041   inds = (int*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(int));
04042   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
04043 
04044   // Perform precomputations.
04045   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
04046     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
04047   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
04048     signs[m]   =  1.0;
04049     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
04050   }
04051   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
04052 
04053  // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
04054   if (verbosity > 0) {
04055     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
04056            "Computing forward transform using DH sampling with ");
04057     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
04058            L, ",", spin, ", FALSE)");
04059     if (verbosity > 1)
04060       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
04061              "Using routine ssht_core_dh_forward_sov...");
04062   }
04063 
04064   // Compute Fourier transform over phi, i.e. compute Ftm.
04065   Ftm = (complex double*)calloc((2*L)*(2*L-1), sizeof(complex double));
04066   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Ftm)
04067   Ftm_stride = 2*L-1;
04068   Ftm_offset = L-1;
04069   f_stride = 2*L-1;
04070   inout = (complex double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(complex double));
04071   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inout)
04072   plan = fftw_plan_dft_1d(2*L-1, inout, inout, FFTW_FORWARD, FFTW_MEASURE);
04073   for (t=0; t<=2*L-1; t++) {
04074     memcpy(inout, &f[t*f_stride], f_stride*sizeof(double complex));
04075     fftw_execute_dft(plan, inout, inout);
04076     for(m=0; m<=L-1; m++) 
04077       Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset] = 
04078         inout[m] * 2.0 * SSHT_PI / (2.0*L-1.0) ;
04079     for(m=-(L-1); m<=-1; m++) 
04080       Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset] = 
04081         inout[m+2*L-1] * 2.0 * SSHT_PI / (2.0*L-1.0);
04082   }
04083   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
04084 
04085   // Compute flm.
04086   dlm1p1_line = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
04087   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dlm1p1_line)
04088   dl_line = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
04089   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl_line)
04090   inds_offset = L-1;
04091   for (el=0; el<=L-1; el++) {
04092     for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) {
04093       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
04094       flm[ind] = 0.0;
04095     }
04096   }
04097   for (t=0; t<=2*L-1; t++) {
04098     theta = ssht_sampling_dh_t2theta(t, L);
04099     w = ssht_sampling_weight_dh(theta, L);
04100     for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
04101       elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
04102       el2pel = el *el + el;    
04103       for (m=-el; m<=el; m++)
04104         inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
04105 
04106       // Compute dl line for given spin.
04107       ssht_dl_beta_kostelec_line_table(dlm1p1_line, dl_line,
04108                                        theta, L, -spin, el,
04109                                        sqrt_tbl, signs);
04110       // Switch current and previous dls.
04111       dl_ptr = dl_line;
04112       dl_line = dlm1p1_line;
04113       dlm1p1_line = dl_ptr;
04114 
04115       for (m=-el; m<=el; m++) {
04116         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
04117         flm[ind] += 
04118           ssign
04119           * elfactor
04120           * w
04121           * dl_line[m+L-1]
04122           * Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset];
04123       }
04124     }
04125   }
04126 
04127   // Free memory.
04128   free(dlm1p1_line);
04129   free(dl_line);
04130   free(Ftm);
04131   free(inout);
04132   free(signs);
04133   free(sqrt_tbl);
04134   free(inds);
04135 
04136   // Print finished if verbosity set.
04137   if (verbosity > 0) 
04138     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Forward transform computed!");  
04139 
04140 }
04141 
04142 
04157 void ssht_core_dh_forward_sov_real(complex double *flm, double *f, 
04158                                    int L, int verbosity) {
04159 
04160   int t, m, el, ind, ind_nm;
04161   int f_stride;  
04162   double *dlm1p1_line,  *dl_line;
04163   double *dl_ptr;
04164   int el2pel, inds_offset;
04165   int *inds;
04166   double *sqrt_tbl, *signs;
04167   int Ftm_stride, Ftm_offset;
04168   complex double *Ftm;
04169   double *in_real;
04170   complex double *out;
04171   double theta, ssign, elfactor;
04172   fftw_plan plan;
04173   double w;
04174   int spin = 0;
04175 
04176    // Allocate memory.
04177   sqrt_tbl = (double*)calloc(2*(L-1)+2, sizeof(double));
04178   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(sqrt_tbl)
04179   signs = (double*)calloc(L+1, sizeof(double));
04180   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(signs)
04181   inds = (int*)calloc(L, sizeof(int));
04182   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(inds)
04183 
04184   // Perform precomputations.
04185   for (el=0; el<=2*(L-1)+1; el++)
04186     sqrt_tbl[el] = sqrt((double)el);
04187   for (m=0; m<=L-1; m=m+2) {
04188     signs[m]   =  1.0;
04189     signs[m+1] = -1.0;
04190   }
04191   ssign = signs[abs(spin)];
04192 
04193  // Print messages depending on verbosity level.
04194   if (verbosity > 0) {
04195     printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
04196            "Computing forward transform using GL sampling with ");
04197     printf("%s%s%d%s%d%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, "parameters  (L,spin,reality) = (", 
04198            L, ",", spin, ", TRUE)");
04199     if (verbosity > 1)
04200       printf("%s%s\n", SSHT_PROMPT, 
04201              "Using routine ssht_core_gl_forward_sov_real...");
04202   }
04203 
04204   // Compute Fourier transform over phi, i.e. compute Ftm.
04205   Ftm = (complex double*)calloc(2*L*L, sizeof(complex double));
04206   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(Ftm)
04207   Ftm_stride = L;
04208   Ftm_offset = 0;
04209   f_stride = 2*L-1;
04210   in_real = (double*)calloc(2*L-1, sizeof(double));
04211   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(in_real)
04212   out = (complex double*)calloc(L, sizeof(complex double));
04213   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(out)
04214   plan = fftw_plan_dft_r2c_1d(2*L-1, in_real, out, FFTW_MEASURE);
04215   for (t=0; t<=2*L-1; t++) {
04216     memcpy(in_real, &f[t*f_stride], f_stride*sizeof(double));
04217     fftw_execute_dft_r2c(plan, in_real, out);
04218     for(m=0; m<=L-1; m++) 
04219       Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset] = 
04220         out[m] * 2.0 * SSHT_PI / (2.0*L-1.0);
04221   }
04222   free(in_real);
04223   free(out);
04224   fftw_destroy_plan(plan);
04225 
04226   // Compute flm.
04227   dlm1p1_line = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
04228   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dlm1p1_line)
04229   dl_line = (double*)calloc(L, sizeof(double));
04230   SSHT_ERROR_MEM_ALLOC_CHECK(dl_line)
04231   inds_offset = 0;
04232   for (el=0; el<=L-1; el++) {
04233     for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
04234       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
04235       flm[ind] = 0.0;
04236     }
04237   }
04238   for (t=0; t<=2*L-1; t++) {
04239     theta = ssht_sampling_dh_t2theta(t, L);
04240     w = ssht_sampling_weight_dh(theta, L);
04241     for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
04242       elfactor = sqrt((double)(2.0*el+1.0)/(4.0*SSHT_PI));
04243       el2pel = el *el + el;    
04244       for (m=0; m<=el; m++)
04245         inds[m + inds_offset] = el2pel + m; 
04246 
04247       // Compute half dl line for given spin.
04248       ssht_dl_beta_kostelec_halfline_table(dlm1p1_line, dl_line,
04249                                            theta, L, -spin, el,
04250                                            sqrt_tbl, signs);
04251 
04252       // Switch current and previous dls.
04253       dl_ptr = dl_line;
04254       dl_line = dlm1p1_line;
04255       dlm1p1_line = dl_ptr;
04256 
04257       for (m=0; m<=el; m++) {
04258         ind = inds[m + inds_offset];
04259         flm[ind] += 
04260           ssign
04261           * elfactor
04262           * w
04263           * dl_line[m]
04264           * Ftm[t*Ftm_stride + m + Ftm_offset];
04265       }
04266     }
04267   }
04268 
04269   // Set flm values for negative m using conjugate symmetry.
04270   for (el=abs(spin); el<=L-1; el++) {
04271     for (m=1; m<=el; m++) {
04272       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind, el, m);
04273       ssht_sampling_elm2ind(&ind_nm, el, -m);
04274       flm[ind_nm] = signs[m] * conj(flm[ind]);
04275     }
04276   }
04277 
04278   // Free memory.
04279   free(dlm1p1_line);
04280   free(dl_line);
04281   free(Ftm);
04282   free(signs);
04283   free(sqrt_tbl);
04284   free(inds);
04285 
04286   // Print finished if verbosity set.
04287   if (verbosity > 0) 
04288     printf("%s%s", SSHT_PROMPT, "Forward transform computed!");  
04289 
04290 }
